T02D1413:30a-25: rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba ni rnam rnam
T02D1413:30a-26: par rtog pa thams cad rnam par dag pa ste
T02D1413:30a-28: rab 'jigs ni dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sku'o //
T02D1413:30a-29: he ru ka dpal ye shes phyogs ni gtso bo'i
T02D1413:30a-30: sku la 'khyud pa ste rdo rje padma snyoms par
T02D1413:30a-31: zhugs pa ljon shing la 'dzegs pa ltar ro //
T02D1413:30a-32: spyan gsum pa ni srid gsum dus gsum sa ler mkhyen pa /
T02D1413:30a-33: drag mo'i gzugs mnga' ma ste /
T02D1413:30a-34: 'jig rten gyi dregs byed srin mo la sogs 'dul ba'o //
T02D1413:30a-35: de'i phyag g-yon pa na ka p'a la ni aanta
T02D1413:30a-36: sa bkang gdug pa can bsgral ba'i dbang po'i sgo'i
T02D1413:30a-37: khrag go // zhal nas rudhir 'dzag cing ni bde ba'i rgyun gsol ba'o //
T02D1413:30a-38: sa bla'i lha dang sa steng mi dang sa 'og
T02D1413:30a-39: gi lha ma yin du bcas pa'i log 'dren rnams
T02D1413:30a-40: thams cad la phyogs bcu kun du ni sdigs mdzub
T02D1413:30a-41: rdo rje dang bcas pas tshar gcod pa'o //
T02D1413:30a-42: dkyil 'khor pa'i rnal 'byor ma sa 'og sa steng /
T02D1413:30b-0: mkha' spyod kyi gnas @30b pa dgod pa yang mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1413:30b-1: gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis dang ldan pa
T02D1413:30b-2: thams cad ni dpal ldan phag mo'i ni rigs las
T02D1413:30b-3: byung zhes ye shes kyi cha shas las byung zhing
T02D1413:30b-4: spro bsdu mdzad pa yang yin no //
T02D1413:30b-5: phyogs dang ni lugs 'byung la phyogs khyi mtshams rnams ni lugs las bzlog pa mtshon pa'o //
T02D1413:30b-6: 'khor lo'i dbus su dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang he ru ka'i sku dang /
T02D1413:30b-7: yig 'bru phyag mtshan bkod pa la mchod par bya ba nyid do //
T02D1413:30b-8: de bzhin 'di ni dpa' bo yang //
T02D1413:30b-9: zhes thod pa'i dum bu can las brtsams te rdo rje sems dpa'i bar du'o //
T02D1413:30b-10: 'khor lo ni sku'i rigs 'khor lo'i mu khyud can dang /
T02D1413:30b-11: gsung gi 'khor lo padma'i mu khyud can dang /
T02D1413:30b-12: thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje'i mu khyud can dang /
T02D1413:30b-13: rigs bdag gi phyag rgya dang yang dag gnas pa bri zhes ye shes lnga'i rtsig pa'i nang du'o //
T02D1413:30b-14: de dag kyang thabs rkang ba'am /
T02D1413:30b-15: yang na shes rab rkyang ba lta bu 'am zhe na /
T02D1413:30b-17: ces las dang 'bras bu myur du 'byin pa 'di nyid /
T02D1413:30b-18: gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya //
T02D1413:30b-19: zhes lha de dag thams cad kyang yab yum thabs
T02D1413:30b-20: dang shes rab dbyer med bde ba chen por ro
T02D1413:30b-21: // de la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas nye bar brgyan pa ni /
T02D1413:30b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi sa phyogs kun du bkod pa legs par brgyan par bya ba ni /
T02D1413:30b-23: rin chen dang zhes mu sa la garbha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1413:30b-24: gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spras pa'i mchod rdzas
T02D1413:30b-25: yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis yongs
T02D1413:30b-26: su bskor ba'o // thar ba chen po'i grong mchog ni lha'i gzhal med khang /
T02D1413:30b-27: yid 'ong ni shin tu mos pas so //
T02D1413:30b-28: mchod na ni zhes dkyil 'khor gyi grib yol dang bla re dang gdugs dang gdung g-yogs kyis so //
T02D1413:30b-29: me tog phreng ba dang spos sna tshogs dang dri'i byug pa la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1413:30b-30: 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med pa yon tan
T02D1413:30b-31: phun sum tshogs pa myur du grub par byed pa'o
T02D1413:30b-32: // 'dir bum par lhag gnas bstan pa ni gzhung 'khrugs ma sbyar ba'i don te /
T02D1413:30b-33: gong du dgos pas blo dang ldan pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1413:30b-34: de nas bum pa bya ba ni //
T02D1413:30b-35: zhes thog ma'i dbang rdzas bsgrub pa las khyad par
T02D1413:30b-36: du rgyu rin po che las byas pa dang sa
T02D1413:31a-0: @31a * // las grub pa yang rung ste /
T02D1413:31a-1: mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i skyon ni /
T02D1413:31a-2: rtsa ba nag po zhes pa 'bar 'bur thag thug
T02D1413:31a-3: med par phyi nang thams cad shin tu 'jam pa
T02D1413:31a-4: la zhabs stegs med pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1413:31a-5: ra ri la sogs med pa ste skyon dang bral ba'o //
T02D1413:31a-6: mtshan nyid yon tan dang ldan pa ste bre gsum la sogs pa tha ma bre gang ngo //
T02D1413:31a-7: bum pa'i snying po'i rdzas ni mu tig gser dang gzhan yang rin po che aindra n'i la dang /
T02D1413:31a-8: byi ru dang dngul dang mu med dang zangs ma'i rgyu ma thing spangs te /
T02D1413:31a-10: bza' ba kun ste 'bru lnga dang snying po lnga /
T02D1413:31a-11: dri lnga dag gis ste spos la sogs pas legs par bkang ste /
T02D1413:31a-12: yang rgyun du 'bab pa'i chus bkang ba la /
T02D1413:31a-13: snod ka p'a la'am du chos sam //
T02D1413:31a-14: nya phyis bzang po bdud rtsi ri lu sbyar ba
T02D1413:31a-15: ni bum pa la 'bras bu can gyi shing gis
T02D1413:31a-16: kha brgyan pa'i steng du gzhag par bya ba rdo
T02D1413:31a-18: kha dgo lnga ba'am yang na gzhan yang gzungs thag
T02D1413:31a-19: ras skud la me tog phreng ba brgyas pas mgrin
T02D1413:31a-20: pa srad bus dkri ba dang zhes 'od zer lnga
T02D1413:31a-22: kha khyer la ni 'dab ma 'bras bu can gyi
T02D1413:31a-23: shing aa mra la sogs pas brgyan par bya ba
T02D1413:31a-24: ste / rgyu 'bras kyi lam ston pa'i byed pa'o //
T02D1413:31a-25: gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa ni bum pa
T02D1413:31a-26: kun las ras kha tshar ma nyams pa zung gis
T02D1413:31a-28: brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod //
T02D1413:31a-29: ces pas rtsva ku sha ras gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag par bya ba ste /
T02D1413:31a-30: bde chen d'a k'i bum pa thod pa rigs kyi dang //
T02D1413:31a-32: dam tshig gi sgo ba ma bzhi dang /
T02D1413:31a-34: las kyi bum pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1413:31a-36: bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag / gtso bo
T02D1413:31a-37: yab yum gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang
T02D1413:31a-38: / bkra shis kyi bum pa yang bya ste /
T02D1413:31a-39: de dag la lha'i mtshan ma dgod par bya'o //
T02D1413:31a-40: bum pa legs par brgyad pa ni //
T02D1413:31a-41: gser ram dngul lam rin chen ni //
T02D1413:31a-42: sna tshogs bkod pas spras pa ste //
T02D1413:31a-43: mu tig gi phreng ba la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1413:31a-44: mdzes par byas pa'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas legs
T02D1413:31a-45: par brgyan pa'o // da ni dkyil 'khor lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya ba ste /
T02D1413:31a-46: bdag nyid kun nas sgo la ni //
T02D1413:31b-0: zhes @31b pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rnam par bkod pa bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02D1413:31b-1: de nyid rten dang brten par bcas pa mngon sum pa ltar bltas la /
T02D1413:31b-2: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas mchod yon zhags bsil dang /
T02D1413:31b-3: phyag dang mchod pas sgo'i phyogs bzhi nas bstod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1413:31b-4: rje btsun he ru ka'i zhal bzhi la dmigs nas
T02D1413:31b-5: thabs shes rab kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
T02D1413:31b-6: brtan par bya'o // bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1413:31b-7: kun nas sgo las ni rang gi lus dkyil 'khor
T02D1413:31b-8: dang tha dad med par byang chub phyogs kyang ngo
T02D1413:31b-9: // dri zhim chu yis legs par gdab par tsandan
T02D1413:31b-10: dang dz'a ti gur kum la sogs pa'i chu la
T02D1413:31b-11: 'khyil pa brjod pas phyogs kun du'o //
T02D1413:31b-12: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02D1413:31b-13: zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang dbang gi
T02D1413:31b-14: sgro nas yon tan nus pa mngon du bya bar
T02D1413:31b-15: 'dod na'o // mchod pa dag kyang lha grangs las mi nyung ba las /
T02D1413:31b-16: mar me brgya ni dbul bya zhing //
T02D1413:31b-18: me tog bdug spos la sogs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su 'khor ba'o //
T02D1413:31b-19: nam mkha'i zhes mkha' spyod ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1413:31b-20: ni 'dir lha mo rnams gtso che zhing thugs kyi
T02D1413:31b-21: dpa' bo dang bcas pa thams cad yid kyis te
T02D1413:31b-22: / rnams pa gsal bas thams cad steng du dgod
T02D1413:31b-23: pa rdo rje'i ka ba dang gdung zlum gyis so
T02D1413:31b-24: / // sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin ni lha mo myu gu can la sogs pa /
T02D1413:31b-25: dkyil 'khor kun du dgod par bya ba gsung gi
T02D1413:31b-26: lha tshogs yab yum ste padma'i ka ba dang padma'i
T02D1413:31b-28: gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor lo'i
T02D1413:31b-29: shugs can ma la sogs pa'i sku'i lha tshogs dpa'
T02D1413:31b-30: bo stobs po che la sogs pa de rnams ni
T02D1413:31b-31: sa 'og gnas su dgod pa 'khor lo'i ka ba
T02D1413:31b-32: dang gdung zlum gyis bteg pa nyid do //
T02D1413:31b-33: rim pa bzhin pho brang 'khor lo rim pa can du gnas pas steng dangs gzhi mtshungs so //
T02D1413:31b-34: de las bde ba chen po'i lha mo ma mo bzhi po ni gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir gnas pa /
T02D1413:31b-35: mu khyud gri gug phreng bas mtshan pa la'o //
T02D1413:31b-36: gzhan yang dam tshig 'khor lo'i ma mo thams cad
T02D1413:31b-37: sgo ba ma ni phyogs dang zhes sgo bzhi'i nang
T02D1413:32a-0: ngos so // phyogs mtshams grva bzhi rnams su gshin rje @32a * //
T02D1413:32a-1: brtan ma la sogs pa dgod par bya zhes 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1413:32a-2: 'khor lo sngom pa'i lha tshogs la gus pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1413:32a-3: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02D1413:32a-5: dri dang me tog bdug spos dang //
T02D1413:32a-6: zhes byug pa man d'a ra ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1413:32a-7: aa ka ru la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-9: zhes rten dang brten par bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyi pho brang yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-10: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya //
T02D1413:32a-11: zhes pas phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa gsang sngags kyis brtan par byed pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-12: yang bkod pa'i bye brag dar gyi rgyal mtshan dang
T02D1413:32a-13: pa dan kha dog dmar ba ni dbang dang dgug
T02D1413:32a-14: pa'o // de bzhin ser ba ni rgyas pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-15: dkar ba dang ni zhi ba'o //
T02D1413:32a-16: gang pa ni mngon spyod do //
T02D1413:32a-17: ser skya dang ni rengs par byed pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1413:32a-18: de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang ni ska shi
T02D1413:32a-19: ka dang panytsa li ka dang de la sogs pa
T02D1413:32a-20: kha dog dang rgyu bzang ba'i bye brag gis so
T02D1413:32a-21: // ku mu dang punda r'i ka la sogs pa'i
T02D1413:32a-22: me tog phreng ba du ma'i chun 'phyang gis brgyan
T02D1413:32a-23: // pa'o // bla re dag dang bcas pa ni gdugs dang za 'og las byas pa la'o //
T02D1413:32a-24: mda' ni brgyad la sogs pa la dha ba bres pas shin tu mdzes par bya'o //
T02D1413:32a-25: yang na yol ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-26: dkyil 'khor ba la tshogs kyi mchod pa dbul ba ni de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis //
T02D1413:32a-27: zhes pas pa la dang mang na la sogs pa
T02D1413:32a-28: khur ba la sogs pa 'bras chan dang sna tshogs
T02D1413:32a-29: pa la / rab mnyam gzhag ste /
T02D1413:32a-30: mchod par bya ba rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D1413:32a-31: ldan pa'i ngang las de dag la tshul bzhin du
T02D1413:32a-32: byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas bdud rtsi dam tshig
T02D1413:32a-33: pa la / ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bstims te lha rnams la mchod cing /
T02D1413:32a-34: lha tshogs thams cad kyi zhal reg par mos pas
T02D1413:32a-35: gsang sngags bzlas shing brten par gyur pa'i don gyis
T02D1413:32a-36: rmi lam sgyu ma tsam du mos pas gtor ma
T02D1413:32a-38: yi ge brgya pa 'don par bya /
T02D1413:32a-39: de ni lha mnyes par bya ba'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:32a-40: da ni le'u mtshan bsdu ba las /
T02D1413:32a-41: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa las zhes rgyu thabs 'bras bu ma bla na med pa'o //
T02D1413:32b-0: @32b mchod pa phyi nang bla na med do //
T02D1413:32b-1: cho ga ni gsang chen 'bras bu myur du ster ba'i gnas /
T02D1413:32b-2: le'u ni gzhung gcod cing skyong ba'o //
T02D1413:32b-3: gnyis pa ni grangs bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:32b-4: le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:32b-6: // / de la 'dir dang por bgegs nye bar zhi ba sa'i cho ga dang /
T02D1413:32b-7: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1413:32b-8: thig gdab cing rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D1413:32b-9: dkyil 'khor lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub cing gnas nye bar brgyan la /
T02D1413:32b-10: mchod pa dang gtor ma legs par bshams pa sngon
T02D1413:32b-11: du 'gro bas de nas thog mar ni bla ma
T02D1413:32b-12: la ji ltar mchod pa bstan pa /
T02D1413:32b-13: de la dpal ldan padma badzra pas //
T02D1413:32b-14: mchod pa kun gyi thog mar ni //
T02D1413:32b-15: bla ma la ni gus pas mchod //
T02D1413:32b-16: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / dpal ldan 'dus dang gzhan du'ang bstan //
T02D1413:32b-17: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pas so //
T02D1413:32b-18: de yang dang por sgrub pa pos zhes bla na
T02D1413:32b-19: med pa'i rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba thob par 'dod
T02D1413:32b-20: pas so // dngos po kun gyis ni gang rang
T02D1413:32b-21: gi yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas dang longs spyod thams
T02D1413:32b-22: pas so // cad do // dang por zhes dus
T02D1413:32b-23: kyi khyad par yon tan grub par byas pa la
T02D1413:32b-24: rdo rje slob dpon ni legs pa'i lam ston pa'i
T02D1413:32b-25: mchog de nyid zhing khyad par can no //
T02D1413:32b-26: grub 'dod ni tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub po //
T02D1413:32b-27: shin tu mnyam gzhag pas ni lhag pa'i lha dpal
T02D1413:32b-28: rdo rje 'chang dang tha dad med par blta bas
T02D1413:32b-29: ci nus pas ni mchod pa phyi nang de kho
T02D1413:32b-30: na nyid kyi bye brag du mas so //
T02D1413:32b-31: de la 'di nyid le'u nyer bdun pa las kyang /
T02D1413:32b-32: bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i //
T02D1413:32b-33: dbang bskur ba ni sngags legs ldan //
T02D1413:32b-35: rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas ni //
T02D1413:32b-36: gtsang spra 'di ni yang dag dpyad //
T02D1413:32b-37: bsod nams gtsang spra las byung ba //
T02D1413:32b-38: sgrub pos yon tan rgya chen thob //
T02D1413:32b-40: de yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor mchod
T02D1413:32b-41: cing dbang ji ltar bskur bar bya ba la dang
T02D1413:32b-42: por rang nus pa mthu dang ldan par bya ba'i
T02D1413:32b-43: phyir 'jug par bya ba ni rig pa'i dbang rnams
T02D1413:32b-44: las / dang por mi bskyod pa chu'i dbang las /
T02D1413:32b-45: dril sbyangs ni bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa
T02D1413:32b-46: aa ka ru la sogs pas spos kyis bdug cing
T02D1413:32b-48: a'a li k'a li yis dag byed kyis bum pa brgyan pa /
T02D1413:33a-1: ste rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan cod pan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1413:33a-2: yang dril sbyangs ni dar dang ras kyis mgul chings
T02D1413:33a-3: byas pa dang 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha
T02D1413:33a-5: yang dbu'i cod pan gyi dar dpyang gis bcings ba yang mtshon pa'o //
T02D1413:33a-6: shin tu sra mkhregs rdo rje ni bdag po 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1413:33a-7: sgra snyan ni tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sngags brjod pa'o //
T02D1413:33a-8: dril bu dkrol ni rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dbang bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:33a-9: ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya ba ni rnam
T02D1413:33a-10: par snang mdzad ming gi dbang khyad par du gyur
T02D1413:33a-11: pa'o // sgrub pa po ni dam tshig gsum dang ldan pas rdo rje slob dpon du /
T02D1413:33a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' drug pa'i bdag nyid du sgrub pa pos gnas par bya'o //
T02D1413:33a-13: rnga brdungs zhing ni rnga bo che dang dung dang
T02D1413:33a-14: chos kyi gand'i la sogs pas lha phrin las la
T02D1413:33a-15: skul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1413:33a-16: de ltar yang d'a ki rgya mtsho'i rgyud las /
T02D1413:33a-17: dril sbyangs bum pa mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D1413:33a-18: aa ga ru sogs spos kyis bdug / legs sbyangs a'a li k'a li yis //
T02D1413:33a-19: dar dbyang mgul chings shing los brgyan //
T02D1413:33a-20: dag byed rin chen 'bru sman dri //
T02D1413:33a-21: snying po chu bo 'bab pas brgyan //
T02D1413:33a-22: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan me tog gi / cod pan dpyang mdzes pas brgyan //
T02D1413:33a-23: shin tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / dril bu don yod rgyal po sbyin //
T02D1413:33a-24: bkra shis brjod pa ha ha zhes //
T02D1413:33a-25: rab sgrogs ming gi dbang bskur bas //
T02D1413:33a-26: sgrub pa dung dang gand'i dang //
T02D1413:33a-27: sgra snyan rnga bo che brdung zhing //
T02D1413:33a-28: lha rnams phrin las myur bskul 'grub //
T02D1413:33a-29: gsang sngags tshig gi sgras snyan brjod //
T02D1413:33a-30: rig pa'i cho ga legs sbyin pa //
T02D1413:33a-31: dkyil 'khor mdun du dbang bskur ro //
T02D1413:33a-33: de la theg pa thun mong ba'i lam ltar na /
T02D1413:33a-34: dril sbyangs ni so sor thar pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1413:33a-35: skyabs 'gro khyad par can dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'o //
T02D1413:33a-38: brgyan pa don dam sems bskyed do //
T02D1413:33a-39: shin tu ni phyi'i 'jug pa drang ba /
T02D1413:33a-40: sgra snyan ni nang gi 'jug pa ye shes dbab pa'o //

T02D1413:36b-4: bye drag tu dbang bstan par 'gyur bas nus pa'i
T02D1413:36b-5: khyad par 'thob tshul dngos dang brgyud pas bstan pa
T02D1413:36b-6: de ltar nges par bya ba ni zhes pa /

T02D1413:36b-8: nges par byed pa cho ga rim pa go rims ma nor bas so //

T02D1413:36b-18: byas / par bya'o // kyi / glegs bam mchod
T02D1413:36b-19: rten la sogs pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur
T02D1413:36b-20: byas / par bya'o // kyi / la / zhu

T02D1413:36b-23: 'bras bu sku bzhi 'thob pa'i nus pa gzhag par

T02D1413:36b-26: kyis bdag la dgongs par 'gyur ba ni de nas

T02D1413:36b-29: ltar 'tsho zhing skyong ba nyid do //
T02D1413:36b-30: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma de dag dang bde legs
T02D1413:36b-31: la rnams par spyod pas 'gro ba'i don du ma
T02D1413:36b-32: byed pa'i // sgrub pa po ni de dag gi
T02D1413:36b-33: phrin las kyi pho nya mang gzhug pa thams cad
T02D1413:36b-34: ci bgyi ba dag dang gang gi bya ba las
T02D1413:36b-35: tshogs thams cad byed par the tshom med par 'gyur
T02D1413:36b-36: byed pa'i // ba'o // da ni dngos grub kyi
T02D1413:36b-37: yon tan 'byung ba ni rnal 'byor 'di ni gnas
T02D1413:36b-38: skabs dang mthar thug gi phrin las la dbang bsgyur
T02D1413:36b-39: byed pa'i // ba'o // ba ste / grub 'gyur
T02D1413:36b-40: na zhes pa dngos grub khyad par can 'thob pa'o
T02D1413:36b-42: rten gsum du mi bzlogs shing ni nang gi dug
T02D1413:36b-43: gsum dag pas srid pa gsum dbang du gyur cing
T02D1413:36b-45: phyir tshangs pa dra po khyab 'jug la sogs pas
T02D1413:36b-46: kyang gnod par mi byed cung slar de dag rnal
T02D1413:36b-47: 'byor pas zil gyis gnon cing bran byed pa nyid
T02D1413:36b-49: do / mi snang bar byed pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1413:36b-50: pa'i rdo rje'i lus kyi ltag pa'i rus mdud kyi
T02D1413:36b-51: rtsar nam mkha'i rlung gi nus pa brtan pas rang
T02D1413:36b-52: bzhin mi snang bar nus pa 'byung /
T02D1413:37a-0: phug dang zhes sa 'og 'gro ba ni ri @37a * //
T02D1413:37a-1: 'bigs byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi phu sgo ste /
T02D1413:37a-2: rtsa dbu ma'i yal ga'i mthongs phyed pas le ba'i
T02D1413:37a-3: thad ka nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gnas pa'i don
T02D1413:37a-4: to // nam mkhar rgyu ba ni dpral ba'i rtsa
T02D1413:37a-5: ma mdud zur gsum par chos nyid kyi rlung 'dus
T02D1413:37a-6: pas rnams rtog gcod pa ste ral gri'i dngos grub
T02D1413:37a-7: phyir nang du thogs pa med par grub pa'o //
T02D1413:37a-8: rkang mthil long bur rlung ni rlung ni rlung las
T02D1413:37a-9: su rung bas rdo rje rkang mgyogs grub pa ste
T02D1413:37a-10: / dpag tshad mang pho skad cig gis phyin pa
T02D1413:37a-11: ste yang zhing 'degs par byed pa'i su pa thob
T02D1413:37a-12: / pas so // rgyud rdo rje sa 'og nas
T02D1413:37a-13: ngang du me rlung la brtan pa thob pas mtshan
T02D1413:37a-14: khung na kun 'dar gyi yal ga'i sgo yod do
T02D1413:37a-15: / pas so // // der lam sbyangs pas lha
T02D1413:37a-16: ma yin gyi phug sgo rnyed pas 'chi med grub
T02D1413:37a-17: pa mngon du byed pa'i don to //
T02D1413:37a-19: ro langs grub pas kyang ro de gser lus su
T02D1413:37a-20: gyur cing lce las ral gri dngos grub 'byung ba'o
T02D1413:37a-21: // yang na gser 'gyur gyi rtsi grub pa ni
T02D1413:37a-22: gsang bar sa rlung ste bas su gyur pa de
T02D1413:37a-23: nyid rlung sems gnam pas so //
T02D1413:37a-24: snying thig le nyid zla kha sbyar gyi bar du
T02D1413:37a-25: rlung sems 'dus pas chu rlung gi nus pas bcud
T02D1413:37a-26: len gyi ri lu grub pa tshe'i dngos grub thob
T02D1413:37a-27: pas dus ma yin par tshe'i dus mi byed pa
T02D1413:37a-28: brgya nyid shu la sog pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1413:37a-29: yang kun 'dar gyi yal ga nu ma gnyis su
T02D1413:37a-30: ya shes kyi rlung brtan pas pum pa bzang po
T02D1413:37a-31: grub cing / nam mkha'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa 'byung ba'o //
T02D1413:37a-32: 'di dag gi don ni le'u so gnyis pa rol langs bsgrub pa las /
T02D1413:37a-33: de nas ro de langs nas ni /
T02D1413:37a-34: cing bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing //
T02D1413:37a-36: tshar gcod phan 'dogs yid dag dang //
T02D1413:37a-37: de bu mig snam gter rnams dang //
T02D1413:37a-38: rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len //
T02D1413:37a-39: gcig cig spyin par byas nas ni //
T02D1413:37a-41: steng dang 'og tu pho nyis grub //
T02D1413:37a-42: rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin //
T02D1413:37a-44: sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsham gyis las chen bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1413:37a-45: dngos grub gnyis nges par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1413:37a-46: rtag par rgyud du bskyed par 'gyur ba 'jig rten
T02D1413:37a-47: par dang 'das pa'i dngos grub du ma la dbang
T02D1413:37a-48: 'byor pa'o // gzugs na du mar byed pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i rkang bzhin du ma /
T02D1413:37b-0: 'dab chags @37b du ma la sogs par bsgyur ba sna tshogs gzugs can no //
T02D1413:37b-2: de yang rnal 'byor ba dbang po yan rab lus yongs su dag pas /
T02D1413:37b-3: sems 'og gsal mngon du gyur pas nam mkha' la
T02D1413:37b-4: ni 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'ja' tshon lta bur gyur
T02D1413:37b-6: lus thogs med dngos snang zil gyis gnon pas dbang
T02D1413:37b-7: phug grub pa'i nus pa sgyu ma lta bu thob
T02D1413:37b-8: pa'o // 'bring gis 'di nyid sbrul shun pa brjes pa ltar 'gyur /
T02D1413:37b-9: thams rdo rje ltar so thub pa ste /
T02D1413:37b-10: lo brgya stong du mar gnas par 'byung ba dang
T02D1413:37b-11: mtshon cha la sog pas mi tshugs pa 'byung ba'o
T02D1413:37b-12: // mkha' 'gro rnams kyang rnal 'byor pa de dang lhan cig tu gnas te /
T02D1413:37b-13: khyad par du 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa la zad par dang /
T02D1413:37b-14: zil gyis nges par gnon pas rdzu 'phrul du ma ston cing /
T02D1413:37b-15: 'gro ba thams cad lha ma srin du ma yang
T02D1413:37b-16: dbang du 'gyur ba phyir rol gyi snang ba'i rlung
T02D1413:37b-17: sna sgo g-yas g-yon du nus pa thob pas 'byung
T02D1413:37b-18: po ro langs dang gnod sbyin po mos bran byed
T02D1413:37b-19: par 'gyur ba'o // mgrin par skye mched drug gi rtsa la brten par gyur pas //
T02D1413:37b-20: 'jug rten gyi ro drug la sogs spyod par nus pa ste /
T02D1413:37b-21: bdud dang srin po mi'am ci di za grub bum la so pa kyang bran byed do //
T02D1413:37b-22: sgrub pa po des lan cig tsam du lta stangs kyis bltas pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1413:37b-23: ting nge 'dzin skad cig tsam gyis ni sa gsum
T02D1413:37b-24: na gnas pa dbang du gyur pas byor ba nyid
T02D1413:37b-25: bskyed / rnams shes dang ye shes kyi phrin las grub pa'o //
T02D1413:37b-26: bshad ma thog pa de ltar bu'i dbang bskur ba
T02D1413:37b-27: thob kyang dngos grub thob pa ma snyam na mi
T02D1413:37b-28: 'grub ste / sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba //
T02D1413:37b-29: zhes pa rkang pa bzhi'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan pa go sla'o //
T02D1413:37b-30: grub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i phyir rnal 'bor
T02D1413:37b-31: ni thabs shes rab gnyis med rgyu thabs 'bras bu
T02D1413:37b-33: bum dbang thob pa dang mchog ni gsang dbang dang /
T02D1413:37b-34: rab ni shes rab ye shes thob pa /
T02D1413:37b-35: bla na med pa gsang chen gyi //
T02D1413:37b-36: sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba dang //
T02D1413:37b-37: stong pa dbyer med ye shes las //
T02D1413:37b-38: dam pa yis ni dbang bzhi pa //
T02D1413:37b-39: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa'i don to //
T02D1413:38a-0: de yang rten gyi gang zag gang zhig skal ldan snod du gyur pa dus rtag tu @38a * //
T02D1413:38a-1: bsgom pa la brtson pas ye shes 'dod gyur ba
T02D1413:38a-2: de ni lha dang lha mi na mi rnams te
T02D1413:38a-3: / zhes sa gsum gyi dbang phyug chen por gyur pas //
T02D1413:38a-4: 'di ni lha mi zil non 'gro ba bdud bzhi'i
T02D1413:38a-5: lha tshogs 'joms shing mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dren pa'i
T02D1413:38a-7: da ni dpal 'khor lo sngom pa rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dbang skur ba thob na /
T02D1413:38a-8: gsang sngags rgyud sde bzhin po kun gyi lam gyi ye shes la dbang bzhi sgrub pa yin //
T02D1413:38a-9: de yang lhar gsal bar yang blta dang zhes lha
T02D1413:38a-10: thabs shes rab kyi sbyor ba mtshon pa bya ba
T02D1413:38a-11: dang / dgod pa ste yab yum bde ba mtshon pa spyod pa dang /
T02D1413:38a-12: lag bcangs te lha yab yum ye shes sbyor ba
T02D1413:38a-13: dpung ba phan tshun bsdams pa tsam gyis bde bas
T02D1413:38a-14: tshim par byed pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang /
T02D1413:38a-15: gnyis 'byor la sogs pa'i zhes lha yab yum thabs
T02D1413:38a-16: shes bra dbang po gnyis sbyor gyi bde ba lam
T02D1413:38a-17: du byed pa gsal nga rnal 'byor bla na med
T02D1413:38a-18: pa'i rgyud do // de dag nang don du ni /
T02D1413:38a-19: rnal 'byor pa'i rdo rje'i lus la rtsa 'khor lo
T02D1413:38a-20: rnams dang ra tsa ro rkyang gnyis la sogs pa
T02D1413:38a-21: thabs shes rab kyi rtsa gnyis la gcig gis blta

T02D1413:38a-23: gi sgras ae wam gi sgras dgod pa sngags 'byung
T02D1413:38a-24: bar bya ba / ba spyod pa / ra sa

T02D1413:38a-26: gcig 'dzin pa lag ba changs kun 'dar la cung
T02D1413:38a-28: 'byor thabs shes rab kyi rtsa sna gnyis po dbu
T02D1413:38a-29: mar tshud pas rtsa gsum ro gcig tu gyur ba
T02D1413:38a-30: dbang po mnyam sbyor bde stong gnyis med rnal 'byor
T02D1413:38a-31: chen po bla med ston pa'o //
T02D1413:38a-32: 'dir ni dbang bskur gyur pa yin //
T02D1413:38a-33: zhes gsang chen dang lam thun mong ba'i lam rim

T02D1413:38a-35: ba byang chub sems kyi khyad par can du sgyur
T02D1413:38a-36: bar byed pa'o // de ltar na rgyud gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pas na /
T02D1413:38a-37: rgyud kun gyi ni bla ma ste byin rlabs phul du byung ba'i don to //
T02D1413:38a-38: gzhan yang de nyid bsdus pa ni tattv'a sam gra to //
T02D1413:38a-39: bde mchog ni sgyur ma bde mchog go //
T02D1413:38a-40: gsang ba ni 'dus pa'am zla gnas thig le'i nor bu'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1413:38a-41: rdo rje 'jig byed las ni gshin rje'i gshed kyi 'grul 'khor yang 'dir 'dus pa'i don to //
T02D1413:38b-0: zhes pas 'di nyid kyi le'u @38b gnyis pa gsum
T02D1413:38b-1: pa bzhi pas thog mar dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1413:38b-2: bstan / bar chad bsrung zhing bdud las rnams par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor le'u sum cu par bstan /
T02D1413:38b-3: dngos grub sgrub pa he ru ka mang la skyes kyi dkyil 'khor so gnyis par bstan /
T02D1413:38b-4: rdzus skyes rim pa le'u lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bar bstan /
T02D1413:38b-5: las dang dngos grub spyi'i dkyil 'khor zhe brgyad par /
T02D1413:38b-6: ma byung ba ni buddha mar me mdzad la sogs pas so //
T02D1413:38b-7: phyid mi 'byung ba ni mgon po byams pa'i bstan pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:38b-8: las dang dngos grub thams cad ni rgyud 'dir bshad
T02D1413:38b-9: pa dang yang 'dir ma bshad pa'i phrin las gang
T02D1413:38b-10: ci yang rung ba thams cad ma lus pa yang
T02D1413:38b-11: rab 'byam de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas 'dir
T02D1413:38b-13: yon tan dang bcas pa dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'i rnams par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:38b-15: // / de la gang le'u dang por gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i gsang chen bstan la /
T02D1413:38b-16: de nyid gsang pa mdor bstan nas le'u gnyis chad kyi yan lag rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1413:38b-17: le'u gnyi pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa sngon du bstan pa /
T02D1413:38b-18: le'u gsum pa dbang bskur ba dngos bstan pa de
T02D1413:38b-19: dag kyang / ngon byang du dpal he ru kas
T02D1413:38b-20: 'og min bde ba chen po'i zhing khams su sangs
T02D1413:38b-21: rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rig ma'i lha mo dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D1413:38b-22: khro bo yang yum gyi tshogs thams cad la bcum
T02D1413:38b-23: ldan 'das chos kyi dku de nyid longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1413:38b-24: sku / byang chub sems rdo rje 'chang las dpal he ru kar bzhengs te /
T02D1413:38b-25: ye shes bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur ba mdzad pa'i //
T02D1413:38b-26: de nas ri rab kyi khang bu brtsegs par dpal
T02D1413:38b-27: he ru ka sku bzhi dbyer med kyi dkyil khor
T02D1413:38b-28: mngon par sprul par mdzad pa yang /
T02D1413:38b-29: 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin zhes pa'i don la /
T02D1413:38b-30: 'og min du dkyil 'khor pa thams cad mngon par
T02D1413:38b-31: byang chub pa'i gsags ba sngon du gyur pa de
T02D1413:38b-32: nyid / de nas gong du gsung pa 'di ni rjes 'jug la dngos pa'o //
T02D1413:38b-33: don du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D1413:38b-34: po rnams ni dpa' bo'i rnams par snang ba nyid
T02D1413:38b-35: la / byang chub sems ma lha mo thams cad la ni rnal 'byor ma rnam ni zhes pas //
T02D1413:38b-37: gnas na zhes yongs su dag bde ba chen po ye shes kyi pho brang du'o //
T02D1413:39a-1: ba ni gar gyi nyams thug rje chen pos so /
T02D1413:39a-2: yang nas la nyis bcu'i dbang phug ye shes kyang
T02D1413:39a-3: dang las rnams par rol pa zhes bde stong gnyis
T02D1413:39a-4: med dang du'o // de dag gi ye shes kyi sku ngas gzung zhing gtan la dpal pa ni /
T02D1413:39a-5: rnal 'byor ma brtson 'grus chen mo ni lha mo rdo rje rab 'jigs ma ste /
T02D1413:39a-6: dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni byang chub sems
T02D1413:39a-7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho nyid
T02D1413:39a-8: do // rnal 'byor ma 'khor los sgyur ma ni gtsug ma ni gtsag tor rnam par gyal ma'o //
T02D1413:39a-9: d'a bo rnams par snang byed ni /
T02D1413:39a-10: byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong ngo /
T02D1413:39a-11: rnal 'byor ma stobs chen ma ni lha mo stong chen mo'o //
T02D1413:39a-12: dpa' bo padma gar dbang ni byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1413:39a-13: rnal 'byor ma rab tu dpa' mo ni lha mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'o //
T02D1413:39a-14: dpa' bo dpal he ru ka ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob bo //
T02D1413:39a-15: rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni lha mo ri khrod lo ma can no //
T02D1413:39a-16: dpa' bo nam mkha'i snying po ni dpal byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D1413:39a-17: rnal 'byor ma chang 'tshong ma ni lha mo rma bya chen mo'o //
T02D1413:39a-18: dpa' bo rta mgrin ni byang chub sems dpa' nyid ma'i snying po'o //
T02D1413:39a-19: rnal 'byor ma dum skyes ma ni lha mo so sor 'brang ma ste /
T02D1413:39a-20: pa'i bo rin chen rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'od do /
T02D1413:39a-21: rnal 'byung ma 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni lha mo rgyal thams rtse mo'i dpung rgyan no //
T02D1413:39a-22: dpa' bo stobs po che ni byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
T02D1413:39a-23: de dag sku'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:39a-24: rnal 'byor ma khva dgong ma ni nye ba'i m'a ma k'i dri ma med pa'i 'od do //
T02D1413:39a-25: dpa' bo mig mi bzang ni byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'dod do /
T02D1413:39a-26: rnal 'byor ma rta rnam ni nye ba'i sbyang ma sa'i lha mo'o //
T02D1413:39a-27: dpa' bo 'jigs byed chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' dang sogs kun 'dren no /
T02D1413:39a-28: rnal 'byor ma shing tu bzang mo ni lha mo nye ba'i gos dkar mo ste /
T02D1413:39a-29: 'do mchog ma dpa' bo rdo rje bzang po ni byang sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa'o //
T02D1413:39a-30: rnal 'byor ma sngos bsangs lha mo ni sems ma sgrol ma ste ri dags 'dzin ma'o //
T02D1413:39a-31: dpa' bo rab tu bzang po ni byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan kun 'joms so /
T02D1413:39a-32: rnal 'byong ma chang 'thung ma ni lha mo brgyad ldan ma ste ae ka dza t'i'o //
T02D1413:39b-0: @39b dpa' bo nyi rdo rje h'um mdzad de bo dha si tva ye shes tog go //
T02D1413:39b-1: rdal 'byor ma rlung gi shugs can ma ni /
T02D1413:39b-2: lha mo di ldan ma dbyangs can ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-3: dpa' bo rdo rje dpa' bo chen po ni /
T02D1413:39b-4: bodhi satva blo gros mi zad pa'o //
T02D1413:39b-5: rnal 'byor ma 'jigs byed chen po ni lha mo
T02D1413:39b-6: gsang sngags rjes 'dzin te rdo rje 'jigs byed ma
T02D1413:39b-7: dpa' bo rdo rje ral pa can ni bo dhi
T02D1413:39b-9: rnal 'byor ma sa srung ma ni lha mo ye shes grong ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-10: dpa' bo ni byung gu can te /
T02D1413:39b-11: bo dhi satva sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel ba'o //
T02D1413:39b-12: de dag gsung gi 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:39b-13: rnal 'byor ma shing grib ma ni lha mo sangs rgyas byang chub sems ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-14: dpa' bo rdo rje'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1413:39b-15: nam mkha'i mdzod de// rnal 'byor ma lang ka'i dbang
T02D1413:39b-16: phyug ma ni lha po pu ka pu rtsi 'do
T02D1413:39b-17: zer can no // dpa' bo rdo rje dod ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'o /
T02D1413:39b-18: rnal 'byor ma mi thung ma ni lha mo rdo rje gzhon nu ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-19: dpa' bo snang ba dpag med ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'o //
T02D1413:39b-20: rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo'i blo ma ni lha mo rdo rje khro gnyer ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-21: dpa' bo chang dgra ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1413:39b-22: rnal 'byor ma sna chen ma ni lha mo rdo rje nyid ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-23: dpa' bo mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ni byang
T02D1413:39b-24: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'o
T02D1413:39b-25: // rnal 'byor ma 'od ldan ma ni lha mo rin chen sgrol ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-26: dpa' bo ni keng rus te byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D1413:39b-27: rnal 'byor ma gtum mig ma ni lha mo skul byad ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-28: dpa' bo ni keng rus chen po ste byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D1413:39b-29: rnal 'byor ma rab tu gtum mo lha mo sems ma rdo rje pho nya ma ste /
T02D1413:39b-30: dpa' bo thod pa'i dum bu can ni /
T02D1413:39b-31: byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ku nud bzang po'o //
T02D1413:39b-32: thugs kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:39b-33: de la dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de dag
T02D1413:39b-34: gis ni gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po
T02D1413:39b-35: la gnas pa las chen dang /
T02D1413:39b-36: dngos grub myur du sgrub byed yin //
T02D1413:39b-38: dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gi nang du dam tshig 'khor lo'i nang du sku'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1413:39b-39: de'i nang du gsung gi 'khor lo chud pa dang /
T02D1413:39b-40: de'i nang khongs su thugs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1413:40a-0: de'i dbus su ni bde ba chen @40a * //
T02D1413:40a-1: po'i 'khor lo ye shes kyi sku gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1413:40a-2: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02D1413:40a-4: 'og min chos kyi dbyings na gnas pa de nyis
T02D1413:40a-5: ri rab kyi rtser yang mtshungs la / ye shes
T02D1413:40a-6: kyi sku ji lta ba de nyid sprul pa 'dzam
T02D1413:40a-9: rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1413:40a-10: sems kyi dkyil 'khor du yang de kho na bzhin du gnas lugs mtshan nyid par shes par bya'o //
T02D1413:40a-11: mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1413:40a-12: zhes pa de dag kyang dpa' bo dang gnyis su
T02D1413:40a-13: med pa phyag rgya chen po 'gro ba'i don mdzad
T02D1413:40a-15: 'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin //
T02D1413:40a-16: zhes gdod ma nas dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
T02D1413:40a-17: nyid dang tha mi dad pas sngon dang phyi ma'i
T02D1413:40a-19: da ni de kho na nyid bzhin dang sbyar ba
T02D1413:40a-20: las slob dpon chen po la ba pa'i bzhad pa
T02D1413:40a-21: ltar na / de la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyi la /
T02D1413:40a-22: rnal 'byor pa'i rdo rje'i lus la rten dang brten pa 'byung bzhin rim brtseg //
T02D1413:40a-26: p'u dza la sogs pa lha'i de kho na nyid las byang chub phyogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1413:40a-27: sngags kyi de kho na nyid las /
T02D1413:40a-28: lha'i mtshan sngags phreng ba ltar bkod pa /
T02D1413:40a-29: aom ni thams cad gsal byed de //
T02D1413:40a-30: zhes sku rdo rje rlung nang du 'jug pa yon tan 'phel ba sdud pa ste /
T02D1413:40a-31: sngags brjod pa la ni aa kun gyi khon na srog sta bur rlung gnas pa /
T02D1413:40a-32: rang ming sla byed dang dbyang sbyar ba las byang
T02D1413:40a-33: ba yo gi ni ma h'a ba'i rya la sogs
T02D1413:40a-34: pa rnams te / sa bon las dbyung ba'o //
T02D1413:40a-35: mthar ni h'um zhes pa rlung phyir 'gro bas nad
T02D1413:40a-36: dang gdon dang god pa thams cad dbyang ba nyid
T02D1413:40a-38: h'um gcig ni snying ga'i 'khor lo'i dbus na /
T02D1413:40a-41: lus kyi sum mdo'i drod kyi rang bzhin 'bar ba can no //
T02D1413:40a-42: ye shes kyi du ni rnal 'byor rab mchog ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1413:40a-43: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lam gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes /
T02D1413:40a-44: sa gser zla ba me lta bu 'bar ba'o //
T02D1413:40a-45: de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rim pas 'phel bas bad chen ye shes me ste /
T02D1413:40a-46: zag pa med pa skyes pas gzhan dang rtsva dang mtshungs zhes //
T02D1413:40a-47: bsreg cing sbyangs pas phun sum tshogs //
T02D1413:40b-0: @40b nus pa thob pa 'di mthong nas //
T02D1413:40b-1: zhes ye shes khyad cig ma gcig tu rtogs pa'o /
T02D1413:40b-2: grub rtsol 'dod pa thams cad ni las dang dngos
T02D1413:40b-3: grub lam gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don 'byung
T02D1413:40b-4: pa'o // slob dpon do mbi he ru ka'i bzhed pa ltar na rang ming brjod pa ni /
T02D1413:40b-5: bum pa'i dbang gi dus su rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba rjes gnas dang /
T02D1413:40b-6: gsang pa'i dbang gi dus su lung bstan pa dang /
T02D1413:40b-7: gsum pa'i dus su a'a li k'a li rigs kyi
T02D1413:40b-8: khyad par ngos bzung bas rigs su nges par bya
T02D1413:40b-9: ba dang / dbang bzhi par tshig dbang rim po
T02D1413:40b-10: che sbyin pa gzengs pa stong pa dang rjes su
T02D1413:40b-11: ba dang / 'brel to // de rtogs lam dbang gi dus su'o //
T02D1413:40b-12: goms par byed pa'i lam du ni /
T02D1413:40b-13: bskyed pa'i rim par rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mtshan
T02D1413:40b-14: sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor brtan pas sngags btu ba
T02D1413:40b-15: mdzad pa'o // rdzogs par rdo rje bzlas pa dang 'brel bas srog rtsol lo //
T02D1413:40b-16: rnal 'byor gyi de kho na nyid ni /
T02D1413:40b-17: dpa' bo nyid gyur ni rang gi lus ngag yid
T02D1413:40b-18: dpal he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje gyur
T02D1413:40b-19: pas tha mal pa ni phyed pas //
T02D1413:40b-20: grub pa ni zhes bskyed par brtan par thob cing /
T02D1413:40b-22: khyim du dkyil 'khor mthong ba yin //
T02D1413:40b-23: zhes pas bum dbang gi dus su sku rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya rtsa yi ge gsal stong /
T02D1413:40b-24: dbang gnyis par gsung gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig phyag rgya rlung brjod pa snang stong /
T02D1413:40b-25: gsum pa'i dus su las kyi phyag rgya thugs rdo rje thig le bde stong gi dkyil 'khor mthong /
T02D1413:40b-26: dbang bzhi pas phyag rgya chan pos rtsa rlung thig le yig de thams cad rom mnyam /
T02D1413:40b-27: ye shes kyi rdo rjer gyur pas mi 'gyur ba
T02D1413:40b-28: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dkyil 'khor mthong ba
T02D1413:40b-30: thabs kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:40b-31: de shes rtag tu bsgoms pas ni //
T02D1413:40b-33: zhes pa bskyed par mngal skyes rgyu'i he ru ka
T02D1413:40b-34: mngon par byang chung pa lngas bde chen du grub
T02D1413:40b-35: pa dang / de nyid yab yum bsrubs ba las
T02D1413:40b-36: bde ba'i dang las 'khor gyi lha tshogs 'byung ba'i
T02D1413:40b-37: pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / 'bras bu'i he
T02D1413:40b-38: ru ka tshad med bzhin lha mo'i glus bskul nas
T02D1413:40b-39: bde ba'i dang las bzhengs nas /
T02D1413:40b-40: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni bde ba chen po mthong ba'o //
T02D1413:41a-1: dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig mas su gyur pa'o //
T02D1413:41a-2: rdzogs par lus kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes kyi ngag kas skad cig gis bskyed pa ste /
T02D1413:41a-3: rim pa bzhi ldan du rdzogs pa ni /
T02D1413:41a-4: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rim pa rjes su rnal 'byor sngags /
T02D1413:41a-5: shin tu rnal 'byor ye shes kyi rim pa /
T02D1413:41a-6: rnal 'byor chen po ni gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:41a-7: yang na gong bu gsum las 'das pa'i dus su /
T02D1413:41a-8: bde ba dang stong pa las /
T02D1413:41a-9: bsam mi khyab pa la gnas pa ni /
T02D1413:41a-10: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa'o //
T02D1413:41a-11: las chen rnams dang dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1413:41a-12: gsungs zhes dbang dang lam gyi rgyud yongs su sbyangs
T02D1413:41a-13: pa thob pas sa dang lam gyi rim pa bgrod
T02D1413:41a-14: nas sangs rgyas par gsungs pa tshe gcig gis rdzogs
T02D1413:41a-15: pa'i byang chub mngon du gyur par bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:41a-16: le'u'i mtshan ni dpa' bo ni nyer lnga po rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang /
T02D1413:41a-17: rnal 'byor ma brtson 'grus chen po sogs gnyis su
T02D1413:41a-18: med par bde ba chen por dgod pa'i cho ga
T02D1413:41a-19: bstan ba'i le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:41a-21: // / gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchog gi rgyud
T02D1413:41a-22: du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dang ldan
T02D1413:41a-23: par sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1413:41a-24: de nas thams cad ces smos te /
T02D1413:41a-26: gsang sngags zlos pa'i bzlas brjod dang //
T02D1413:41a-27: zhes mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1413:41a-28: de nas yang lag brgyad ldan gyis mdzes byed de
T02D1413:41a-29: ni thabs dang shes rab ye shes gsum gyi sgo
T02D1413:41a-30: las rnyed // gsang sngags kyi ni stobs dag mtshungs
T02D1413:41a-31: pas gzhan med dge ba gsum du yongs dag 'dir
T02D1413:41a-32: las rnyed // bstan pa'o // de la dang po
T02D1413:41a-33: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags
T02D1413:41a-34: las rnyed // bstan pa'o // kyi lus dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi dgod pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:41a-36: sngags ba tu ba'i gnas mdun gyi ma da na dang bdud rtsis byugs pa'i mandala la /
T02D1413:41a-37: nang du rdo rje'i lus kyi lte ba'i 'og tu
T02D1413:41a-38: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam par snang
T02D1413:41a-39: ba'o // de las 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad 'byung bas na /
T02D1413:41a-40: bde bar gshegs pa'i bral pa dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi brten pa'o //
T02D1413:41a-41: sna tshogs padma ni 'dab ma brgyad pa ste /
T02D1413:41b-0: chags pa @41b med pa 'dam gyis ma gos pa /
T02D1413:41b-1: bde ba skye ba'i rten de la rang bzhin gyis dri ma dag pa'o //
T02D1413:41b-2: lte ba ni snying por gyur pa ste /
T02D1413:41b-3: der gnas pa'i yi ge ni ma skyes pas skye ba med pa /
T02D1413:41b-4: gnyis su med pa'i don 'byung ba'i ba'o //
T02D1413:41b-5: mi shigs pa ni 'khrul ba'i rtog pas mi phyed pa /
T02D1413:41b-6: tha mal pa'i 'dod chags kyi zag bcas spros pa las dben pa'o //
T02D1413:41b-7: shin tu dge ba bkra shis pa dang /
T02D1413:41b-8: bde legs 'byung ba mchog gi rtsa dbu ma'o //
T02D1413:41b-9: sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bris //
T02D1413:41b-10: zhes pa go rims ma nor bar bya ba rtsa'i
T02D1413:41b-11: 'dab ma la thig le yi ge'i gzugs su gnas
T02D1413:41b-12: pa'o // chos 'byung ni srung ba'i 'khor lo dang
T02D1413:41b-13: sa'i cha mnyam pas chogs gnyis sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1413:41b-14: pa'o // / ming tshig yi ge rab tu byed
T02D1413:41b-15: pa du ma gcig du bsdu bar bya ba ni
T02D1413:41b-16: brjod bya don gyi gsang bar /
T02D1413:41b-17: rjod sgra dang yi ge ma lus pa spro ba dang sdud pa rlung gis so //
T02D1413:41b-18: slar rgyas par bstan pa la /
T02D1413:41b-20: gang lha thams cad bskyed pa dang gnas pa dang thim pa dang 'byung ba dang /
T02D1413:41b-21: 'jug pa gnas pa mngon par 'byung ba'o //
T02D1413:41b-22: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas pa ni 'du byed lnga bcu sems las byung brgya phyed phreng ba'o //
T02D1413:41b-23: sna g-yon nas zla ba'i cha 'jug pa sde mtshan dang po //
T02D1413:41b-24: sna sgo g-yas nas 'byung ba nyi ma'i cha sde tshan bdun /
T02D1413:41b-25: rtsa kun 'dar gnas pa la ro rkyang la yi ge sde tshan brgyad ro mnyam pa'o /
T02D1413:41b-26: sde tshan la ni thim par bya ba rigs kyi dbye ba ma 'dres par ro //
T02D1413:41b-27: thabs dang shes rab kyi cha phyed pas rtsad dbu mar 'jug pa'o //
T02D1413:41b-28: bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas pa //
T02D1413:41b-29: zhes pa thig gi khyad par g-yas g-yon cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1413:41b-30: de yang thabs shes rab mnyam par sbyar bas dga' bad dang skad cig ma'o //
T02D1413:41b-31: thub pa mchog ni re'u mig bdun pa ste /
T02D1413:41b-32: sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rabs bdun brdar bstan pa /
T02D1413:41b-33: de dag gi dgog par bya ba ni re mig zhe dgu //
T02D1413:41b-34: gsal byed nyi ma rta brta bdun ldan no //
T02D1413:41b-35: der gnas dpa' bo 'du bya ba ni bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa /
T02D1413:41b-36: lha dang sngags tha ma dad pa nyid phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D1413:41b-37: 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D1413:41b-38: zhes gnas skabs su las chen dang thun mong mtha' thug tu mchog sku dang ye shes myur du'o //
T02D1413:42a-0: de la dpal he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags las khyad par brkang pa brgyad pa'i @42a * //
T02D1413:42a-2: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //
T02D1413:42a-3: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1413:42a-6: rang he ru kar gsal ba'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1413:42a-7: mdun gyi sngags la phog de'i 'od kyi snang ba
T02D1413:42a-8: chen pos phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1413:42a-9: dpa' dang dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi
T02D1413:42a-10: yon tan phrin las thams cad bsdus te /
T02D1413:42a-11: rang la thim pas byin rlabs dang /
T02D1413:42a-12: dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni gsang sngags kyi che ba bstan pa pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-13: aushm'a na yi gnyis pa nyid //
T02D1413:42a-14: de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-15: zhes pa'i bar gyi bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-16: dang po'i dang po nyid dang ni //
T02D1413:42a-17: zhes pa nas gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi yin no //
T02D1413:42a-18: zhes pa'i bar gyis dpal he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i
T02D1413:42a-19: sngags las rkang pa nyid shu rtsa bzhi pa'i lus
T02D1413:42a-20: thu ba'i gsang ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-21: de nas ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i dpa' bo nyer bzhi pa'i 'khor lo bkod pa'o /
T02D1413:42a-22: gsang sngags kyi che ba'i khyad par bstan pa la /
T02D1413:42a-23: rig pa'i rgyal po ni sngags 'di rigs sngags dang gsungs sngags /
T02D1413:42a-24: gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-25: bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa ni rnam pa
T02D1413:42a-26: ni rnam shes dang ye shes kyi las kyis tshar
T02D1413:42a-28: 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i snying po nyid do //
T02D1413:42a-29: 'jig rten gsum na yod min te //
T02D1413:42a-30: zhes lha dang mi dang klu'i gnas thams cad na'o //
T02D1413:42a-31: shr'i he ru ka'i sngags shes nas //
T02D1413:42a-32: zhes spyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs bskul ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar ston pa rtsa sngags /
T02D1413:42a-33: yon tan phrin las phyogs 'ga' ston pa snying po /
T02D1413:42a-34: ye shes sdud par gsal ba'i mtshan nyid nye ba'i
T02D1413:42a-35: snying po yin zhes dpal rdo rje dril bu pas
T02D1413:42a-36: bzhed do // me ste gzhan dag rtsva dang mtshungs //
T02D1413:42a-37: zhes rgyud 'di ni ye shes kyi me lta bu /
T02D1413:42a-38: spang bya dang por 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bsreg pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-39: rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags //
T02D1413:42a-40: zhes pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las snying po bla na med pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:42a-41: des sngags kyi phan yon bstan pa'i tshul gyis gzhung bsdu ba'o //
T02D1413:42a-43: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge bsdu ba'i cho ga
T02D1413:42b-0: ni rdo rje slob @42b dpon gyis slob ma la
T02D1413:42b-1: lung sngags kyi rjes gnang bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:42b-2: le'u lnga ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:42b-4: // / de la gsang sngags kyi grub pa bla na med pa mchog tu bstan pa las /
T02D1413:42b-5: gzhan yang zhes pa rnam grangs du ma la /
T02D1413:42b-6: khyad par du go cha'i sngags bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:42b-7: yi ge nyi shu gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1413:42b-8: snying po gsang sngags dngos ni le'u brgyad par bstan
T02D1413:42b-9: pa'o // snying po yi ge bdun nye snying po
T02D1413:42b-10: zhes pa le'u bcu gnyis par gsal bar bstan no
T02D1413:42b-11: pa'o // // ya ste brgyad pa'i sa bon dang /
T02D1413:42b-12: zhes pa ya ra la wa sha sha sa ha yig 'bru brgyad brgyad pa nyid las /
T02D1413:42b-13: grod khyer dkrugs pa ni yi ge'i phyi mo brgyad do //
T02D1413:42b-14: de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi //
T02D1413:42b-15: zhes thabs shes rab kyi phyag rgya drug ldan phyi dang nang gi skye mched sbyong bas /
T02D1413:42b-16: rten 'brel gyi yan lag rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1413:42b-17: dbyangs kyi ma ning yi ge gtogs pas /
T02D1413:42b-18: yi ge bar ma dor byas pa ni a'a li'i
T02D1413:42b-19: ring po drug bzhag nas thung ngu rnams ha la
T02D1413:42b-20: sbyar ba'i sa bon lta bu'o //
T02D1413:42b-21: yan lag drug ni rigs kyi khro bo ste /
T02D1413:42b-22: he ru kar brjod pa dang lus kyi gnas drug tu'o //
T02D1413:42b-23: dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02D1413:42b-26: shr'i he ru ka rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog don yod rgyal po'o //
T02D1413:42b-27: yi ge gcig ni ha ste /
T02D1413:42b-28: de la rkyen ai au ae ao am sbyar bas
T02D1413:42b-29: ha hi he ho ham gis mdzes par gyur pa'o
T02D1413:42b-31: 'bras bu mngon par shes pa drug char ba'i nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1413:42b-37: phat dang yang dag ldan pa snying po gsang ba nyid do //
T02D1413:42b-38: sgrub pos snying por shes par bya ba ni dus dang gnas skabs kun du'o //
T02D1413:42b-39: de la lus kyi gnas su dmigs pa la//
T02D1413:42b-40: dang po snying ga nyid du ste zla ba la aom ha las rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1413:42b-41: gnyis pa mgo bor shes par bya zla ba la rnam snang /
T02D1413:42b-42: gsum pa'i spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar ba nyi ma la padma gar dbang /
T02D1413:42b-43: bzhi pa go cha nyid du nges pa shr'i he ru ka nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:42b-44: lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste rdo rje nyi ma zla ba la'o /
T02D1413:42b-45: drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar brjod pa dpal rta
T02D1413:42b-46: mchog rgyan dang so so'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pa
T02D1413:42b-47: ste / nus pa mi mchog tu gyur pa thob pas bsrung ba'i mchog bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:43a-1: go cha bstan pa le'u drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:43a-3: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom
T02D1413:43a-4: ldan 'das he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags rdo rje
T02D1413:43a-5: zhabs bkra shis ston pa'i lus gong du 'byung ba
T02D1413:43a-6: la dbyangs yig rgyan gyis mdzes byed bstan pa la
T02D1413:43a-7: / rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las /
T02D1413:43a-8: gsang sngags rnams kyi 'byung gnas ni //
T02D1413:43a-9: de nyid lhag gnas sku gsungs thugs //
T02D1413:43a-10: rnam shes las ni nyer 'byung bas //
T02D1413:43a-11: sgra las rkyen sbyar rgyu las bstan //
T02D1413:43a-12: yi ge khong 'byung brjod pa las //
T02D1413:43a-13: ming tshig rab 'byed snying po nyid //
T02D1413:43a-14: bzlas pa tha mal dag byed pas //
T02D1413:43a-17: dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid ces pa nas /
T02D1413:43a-18: yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis la //
T02D1413:43a-19: de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar //
T02D1413:43a-20: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:43a-21: yang rtsa ba las rkang pa nyer bzhi pa'i sngags
T02D1413:43a-22: kyi lus dang dbyangs yig rgyan du gyur pa bstan
T02D1413:43a-23: pa ni / ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid //
T02D1413:43a-25: dgu bcu dang ni rtsa brgyad do //
T02D1413:43a-26: zhes pa'i bar gyis sgra dang sgra'i lus su 'brel
T02D1413:43a-27: ba la rkyen gyis bsgyur bas yang dag pa'i de
T02D1413:43a-28: kho na nyid gsang bla na med pa ston pa'o
T02D1413:43a-29: // sngags kyi phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:43a-30: 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su //
T02D1413:43a-31: mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya //
T02D1413:43a-32: zhes pas rkang pa nyer bzhi pa rgyan dang ldan
T02D1413:43a-33: pas dag par gyur pa ni dpa' bo chen po
T02D1413:43a-34: 'khor ba'i g-yul las rgyal zhing bdud thams cad 'jom
T02D1413:43a-35: par byed pa'o // 'di ni re'u mug las btus pa //
T02D1413:43a-36: zhes chos kyi gzhi dgod pa las so //
T02D1413:43a-37: rgyal ba kun gyis ni rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i
T02D1413:43a-38: snying po'i mchog tu gyur pa gsang chen mngon du
T02D1413:43a-39: 'byung ba'o // he ru ka dpal 'gro mgon gyis //
T02D1413:43a-40: zhes rdo rje btsun yab yum gyi gsung thugs kyi snying po bskul ba'o //
T02D1413:43a-41: rtsa ba'i sngags mchog tu zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1413:43a-42: sku gsung thugs dbyer med las cha [?] nyer bzhi
T02D1413:43a-43: rnam thar brgyad kyi ye shes rdo rje yon tan
T02D1413:43a-44: 'byung gnas so // dngos grub kun gyi gnas yin
T02D1413:43a-45: zhing ni yon tan phrin las mchog thun mong 'thob
T02D1413:43a-46: 'byung gnas so // pa'o // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa yin //
T02D1413:43a-47: zhes thugs brtse bas sgrub po la nye bar dgongs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1413:43b-0: dpal ldan @43b khrag 'thung ni rnam thar sgo gsum
T02D1413:43b-1: dbyer med pa'i sku can lha rigs rgyal ni rigs
T02D1413:43b-2: lnga la sogs pa'i snying pos bar chad zhi zhing
T02D1413:43b-4: bklags pas 'grub pa ni sngags dang lha tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:43b-5: don yod pa ste dkyil 'khor pa'i zhal nye bar bsgrub pa nyid do //
T02D1413:43b-6: khyad par du bye brag tu thog mtha'i yi ge
T02D1413:43b-7: sbyar ba dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa ni
T02D1413:43b-8: / aom ni dang po sbyar bar bya //
T02D1413:43b-10: h'um h'um phat ni tha mar ro //
T02D1413:43b-11: zhes yang na dpa' bo nyer bzhi so sor phye ba yang rung do //
T02D1413:43b-12: 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te /
T02D1413:43b-13: bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02D1413:43b-14: zhes dbang bskur ba'i rjes la sngags dang lha'i rjes
T02D1413:43b-15: gnang sbyin par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
T02D1413:43b-16: pas so // de'i le'u'i mtshan bstan pa dpal 'khor
T02D1413:43b-17: lo bde ba mchog las zhes rim pa gnyis ldan
T02D1413:43b-18: phyag rgya bla na med pa'o //
T02D1413:43b-19: sngags btu ba ni lhag chad nor ba rgyang ring di spang ba'i phyir //
T02D1413:43b-20: cho ga ni dbang dang rjes su 'brel ba /
T02D1413:43b-22: bdun pa ni grangs bstan pa ste /
T02D1413:43b-23: le'u bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:43b-25: // / de las rtsa ba'i gsang sngags la sogs pa
T02D1413:43b-26: bzlas brjod thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba lha'i
T02D1413:43b-27: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ni de nas zhes lha
T02D1413:43b-28: dang sngags dbyer med du bstan pa ste /
T02D1413:43b-29: rang gi bdag nyid kyis zhes mngon par rtogs pa
T02D1413:43b-30: nyams su blang ba sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes thams
T02D1413:43b-31: cad la dpal he ru ka'i nga rgyal dang ldan
T02D1413:43b-32: pas so // dpa' bo thams cad ni rdo rje
T02D1413:43b-33: sems dpa' la sogs pa nyer bzhi po rnams dang
T02D1413:43b-34: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba'i bde ba la rol
T02D1413:43b-35: pas so // pa / mkha' 'gro ma ni brtson
T02D1413:43b-36: 'grus chen po la sogs pa rnams dang ye shes
T02D1413:43b-38: dra ba'i sngom pa ni snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi dang sgo mtshams ma brgyad de /
T02D1413:43b-39: de dag bcu gnyis po yang gtso bo nyid kyis
T02D1413:43b-40: bde chen du snyoms par 'jug pa la bstan pa'o
T02D1413:43b-42: ces lha thams cad yab yum du gnas pa de
T02D1413:43b-43: nyid gsang sngags nyid kyang thabs shes rab bzung du
T02D1413:43b-44: 'brel bas gnyis su med pa'i dang ru gnas par
T02D1413:43b-45: dgod pa'o // snying po go bzlog tu bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:43b-46: shes rab rlom pa dag rang dgar 'jug pa dgag
T02D1413:43b-47: pa'i phyir bla ma la rag lus par bya ba'i
T02D1413:44a-1: lugs las bzlog par bstan pa h'a sv'a la sogs pa yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1413:44a-2: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa las /
T02D1413:44a-3: lha rnams bzlog ste bkod pa dang //
T02D1413:44a-4: bsgom pa gsang ba'i bzlog pa dang //
T02D1413:44a-5: sngags kyi bkod pa bzlog pa ni //
T02D1413:44a-6: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed //
T02D1413:44a-8: rig pa'i rgyal po ni lam lnga byang chub phyogs
T02D1413:44a-9: kyi chos thams cad sems su 'dus pas snying po
T02D1413:44a-10: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rab tu bskul
T02D1413:44a-11: ba ste / ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
T02D1413:44a-12: ni thub pa mar me mdzad nas thub pa 'od
T02D1413:44a-13: ba ste / srungs dang / mgon po ma pham pas kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ba /
T02D1413:44a-14: 'og min dag pa'i zhing ni ma gtogs pa'o /
T02D1413:44a-15: ta pha h'um h'um ha ha /
T02D1413:44a-16: hr'i aom zhes rje btsun yab yum dang sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las so //
T02D1413:44a-17: rje btsun ma'i go cha'i sngags ni /
T02D1413:44a-18: yi ge aom bam dang ham yom dang ni //
T02D1413:44a-19: hrim mo dang ni hrem hrem de nyid dang //
T02D1413:44a-20: h'um h'um phat phat ces bshad pa ni /
T02D1413:44a-21: rim pa can dang rim pa bzlog pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1413:44a-22: rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu grags //
T02D1413:44a-23: zhes go cha drug lus la'o //
T02D1413:44a-24: aom badzra bee ro na'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1413:44a-25: rje btsun ma'i nye ba'i snying po'i //
T02D1413:44a-26: mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che ni yab yum gyis sngags tshan bzhi'o //
T02D1413:44a-27: ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni dus gsum
T02D1413:44a-28: gyi rtog pas mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu'o
T02D1413:44a-29: // da ltar ba snying po lta bu ni steng
T02D1413:44a-30: na ni zhes pas rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa
T02D1413:44a-31: la rin chen bzhi zhes yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T02D1413:44a-32: rin po che dbang gi rgyal po lta bu tshan
T02D1413:44a-34: bzhin ni rtsa ba dang snying po dang nye snying dang go cha zung du gyur pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D1413:44a-35: phreng ba'i sngags ni zhes dpa' bo dang /
T02D1413:44a-36: rnal 'byor ma'i gsang sngags la thog mtha' gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1413:44a-37: dam pa yin zhes pas mchod pa'o sngags ka thams
T02D1413:44a-38: cad la thabs shes rab chang bar shes par bya
T02D1413:44a-39: ba nyid do // mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen
T02D1413:44a-40: mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma'i
T02D1413:44a-41: ba nyid do // sngags rnams so // rig pa'i
T02D1413:44a-42: rgyal po he ru ka ni bla na med pa'i
T02D1413:44a-43: ba nyid do // sngags rnams so // sngags rnams
T02D1413:44a-44: te / de yang mchog pa dang bstod pa gsol
T02D1413:44a-45: ba gdab pa dbang bskur ba rgyas gdab pa bdud
T02D1413:44a-46: rtsi myang ba thams cad gsang sngags nyid las byung
T02D1413:44b-0: le'u'i mtshan ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi @44b sngags
T02D1413:44b-1: btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad
T02D1413:44b-3: / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1413:44b-4: lam gyi khyad par mngon par rtogs pas 'bras bu'i gsang chen la /
T02D1413:44b-6: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02D1413:44b-7: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni //
T02D1413:44b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i snying po nyid las
T02D1413:44b-10: cho ga du mar 'gyur ba med dang yon tan
T02D1413:44b-11: dbang phyug nyid dus dang rgyu rkyen byed pa'i tshul
T02D1413:44b-12: gyi rab 'byams rtog pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang
T02D1413:44b-14: gang zag 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i le'u 'dis ston to //
T02D1413:44b-15: de yang le'u gnyis pa dang gsum par bstan pa'i cho gas dbang bskur pa thob pas /
T02D1413:44b-16: le'u bzhi pa dang brgyad pa'i stod bzhin du lha la dmigs nas /
T02D1413:44b-18: drug pa bdun pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags btus nas /
T02D1413:44b-19: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bsnyen pa dang
T02D1413:44b-20: nye bar sgrub pa sngon du 'gro bas bya ba
T02D1413:44b-22: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi las tshogs ni las dang
T02D1413:44b-23: dngos grub myur du grub pa'i thabs dang thabs las
T02D1413:44b-24: byung ba'o // go rims ji bzhin ni dang por rtsa sngags /
T02D1413:44b-26: snying po mchod pa'i sngags de dag ni rnam par bshad bya ste /
T02D1413:44b-27: de yang dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas sbyor ba bsam gtan tsam gyis /
T02D1413:44b-28: 'dres pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin dang sngags kyis so //
T02D1413:44b-29: ma dag pas ni 'khrul 'khor rdzas dang phyag rgya ldan pas 'grub pa'o //
T02D1413:44b-30: 'jig rten gsum na gang yod rnams //
T02D1413:44b-31: zhes bsgrub par bya ba'i yul te khams na gnas pa gang yang ngo //
T02D1413:44b-32: thams cad ni gzhan yang rigs ldan mchod pa dang spyod pa rjes su 'brel ba lta stangs bya'o //
T02D1413:44b-33: bya ba rdzogs pa'i skad cig gis 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1413:44b-34: gdul bya rod rje thig pa la dgod pa'i phyir
T02D1413:44b-35: phrin las rnams thams cad myur du grub par byed
T02D1413:44b-36: pa'o zhes ji ltar bshad pa rnams so //
T02D1413:44b-37: sgrub par byed pa'i thabs kyi dbang du byas na /
T02D1413:44b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyi ngo bo nyid le'u nyer lnga par ston la /
T02D1413:44b-39: 'dir ni cho ga'i rim pa las gsang sngags kyi
T02D1413:44b-40: phan yon 'bras bu'i che ba dang ldan pa ston
T02D1413:44b-41: pa'o // rgya par bshad pa la /
T02D1413:44b-42: klu thams cad dang zhes nor rgyas bu la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:45a-3: gnod sbyin thams cad ni rnam thos sras la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:45a-4: dri za thams cad ni zur phung lnga pa can la sogs pa'o //
T02D1413:45a-5: skye gnas thams cad ni 'gro ba drug pa'o //
T02D1413:45a-6: dran pa tsam gyis ni shin tu dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phrin las so //
T02D1413:45a-7: bran du khol ba dang zhi ba rgyas pa dbang
T02D1413:45a-8: du byed pas gsod pas te mngon spyod kyang ngo
T02D1413:45a-9: // char 'bebs par byed pa ni nges brjod dang
T02D1413:45a-10: rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas gsungs pa ltar rnams shes
T02D1413:45a-11: dang ye shes kyi las bstan pas so //
T02D1413:45a-12: yang na rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor byas te /
T02D1413:45a-13: dkyil 'khor ras sam shing shun la klu brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris la /
T02D1413:45a-14: phyi rol nas 'khor lo gsum gyis bskor zhing dug
T02D1413:45a-15: dang lan tshva dang ske tshe dang tsha ba gsum
T02D1413:45a-16: dang dur khrod kyi thang shing gi dud pas snag
T02D1413:45a-17: tsha byas la dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1413:45a-18: sngags bkod la / klu brgyad po rnams kyi snying gar phu h'um n'am h'um zhes dgod la /
T02D1413:45a-19: dbus su h'um phu n'am h'um sarba n'a ga barsha
T02D1413:45a-20: ma na ya bha ri sha ya h'um phat ces
T02D1413:45a-21: bri'o // yang grog mkhar gyi sa dang chu 'gram
T02D1413:45a-22: gyis rdzing bu'i sa la ba'i rnam lnga dang bsres
T02D1413:45a-23: la klu nor rgyas kyi gzugs gdengs ka bdun pa
T02D1413:45a-24: can gang tsam du byas pa'i snying gar sngags kyi
T02D1413:45a-25: dkyil 'khor bcug ste dgug gzhug byas nas /
T02D1413:45a-26: sngags kyi 'od spro bsdu bzlas pa khri phrag la sogs pa /
T02D1413:45a-27: ka ra ba'i ra'i lcug mas bkab ste gu gul dkar po'i du bas bdug cing /
T02D1413:45a-28: dri bzang po'i chus khrus bya'o //
T02D1413:45a-29: gal te cha ra ma bab na /
T02D1413:45a-30: nyi ma bdun pa la lus de dum bur byas te /
T02D1413:45a-31: rdza'i bum par bcug nas chu bor bskur na char 'bebs par byed pa'o //
T02D1413:45a-32: sprin thams cad 'thor bar byed cing zlog par byed
T02D1413:45a-33: do zhes char ches na sprin dral ba'i cho ga
T02D1413:45a-34: ste / snga ma bzhin du 'khrul 'khor bris la /
T02D1413:45a-35: nor rgyas kyi gzugs kyi snying gar gzhug ste dgug bstim byas la /
T02D1413:45a-36: yungs kar gyis brdeg pa'am yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa la phul ba'i me tog dag dang /
T02D1413:45a-37: gu gul nag po dang bsres pa'i du bas bdug cing rtsa sngags zlos shing /
T02D1413:45a-38: sha chen gyi sngos kyis bdugs pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o /
T02D1413:45a-39: byed pa ni gzhan gyis bdag la byed ka klu
T02D1413:45a-40: brgyad gnon pa'i zhal lnga pa'i mkha' lding gi he
T02D1413:45b-0: ru ka @45b bsgoms nas bzlas pa byas te //
T02D1413:45b-2: rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gnas par bsams la /
T02D1413:45b-3: nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi gzi brjid dang ldan par
T02D1413:45b-4: bsams pas gdon mi za bar grub par 'gyur pa'o
T02D1413:45b-5: // yang kha tv'am ga dang yang thod pa la
T02D1413:45b-6: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re zhing la yang
T02D1413:45b-7: rkang pa brgyad pa bri zhing //
T02D1413:45b-8: chu bo la khv'am gas bsun na rgyun phyogs las
T02D1413:45b-9: bzlog ste 'bab par ston to zhes pa'i don to
T02D1413:45b-10: // dbang po zlog par byed pa'i don ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan ma mthong bas /
T02D1413:45b-11: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor shing shun la gun
T02D1413:45b-12: gum gyis bris te lag pa g-yon par bzhag la
T02D1413:45b-13: / sngags las 'od 'phro ba dang ldan par bsgoms pas /
T02D1413:45b-14: sdigs mdzub byas na thob nges par bzlog go / gsang sngags 'di ni rtsa sngags so //
T02D1413:45b-15: bzlas brjod 'bum byas pa ni dpal he ru ka rgyas pa'i skur gsal bar /
T02D1413:45b-16: rnal 'byor pas tri sha'u la kha sbubs te sa la bsnun nas g-yo bar byed pa'o //
T02D1413:45b-17: shing la 'dzegs te zhes pa ni gser shing gi
T02D1413:45b-18: sa bon sprul nag gi tshil bus lan nyi shu
T02D1413:45b-19: spabs la / bya rog gi thod par dur khrod
