T02D1413:105a-33: mkha' 'gro kun gyi bla na med pa'i ye shes
T02D1413:105a-34: mchog dge ba'i don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'o
T02D1413:105a-35: // snying po 'di ni dbyings kyi ngang la gnas
T02D1413:105a-36: pa'i sku gsung thugs bskul ba rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1413:105a-37: kyi gtso mor gyur ba rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
T02D1413:105a-38: stong ba nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1413:105a-39: de la gus pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa ni /
T02D1413:105a-40: las dngos grub mtsho myur du thob par byed pa'i don to /
T02D1413:105a-41: khams gsum gyi dbang phyug tu gyur par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:105a-42: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni rnal 'byor pas lha dang sngags kyi gsang ba nyid do //
T02D1413:105a-43: 'jig rten gsu po g-yo byed cing ni sa 'og
T02D1413:105a-44: sa steng sa bla'i lha la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1413:105b-0: rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang ni @105b gsang ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par gyis te /
T02D1413:105b-1: dbang po rab 'bring rnams la ste bskyed pa'i rim par lha la gnang ba thob cing /
T02D1413:105b-2: rdzogs par rtags 'ga' thon pas so //
T02D1413:105b-3: las chen thams cad dang grub pa brgyad la sogs
T02D1413:105b-4: pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi don dngos grub
T02D1413:105b-5: rnams rim bzhin ster bar 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:105b-6: phyag rgya chen po'i mchog 'grub pa'o //
T02D1413:105b-7: lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i las gsang sngags go
T02D1413:105b-8: bzlog tu bstan pa ni h'a sv'a nas aom gyi
T02D1413:105b-9: bar du bstan pa snying po gsang ba bstan pa'o
T02D1413:105b-11: sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub pa ste zhes rdo rje ltar thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D1413:105b-12: las rnams kun byed dge ba yin //
T02D1413:105b-13: zhes thog mtha' bar du mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1413:105b-15: dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1413:105b-16: rnam pa las bzhi dang bcas pa'i dur khrod la
T02D1413:105b-18: me 'od phreng bas bskor ba bya /
T02D1413:105b-19: lte ba la padma 'dab ma bcu pa la sngags dgod pa ste //
T02D1413:105b-21: shar nas g-yon bskor du 'dab ma re la yig 'bru gnyis gnyis dgod par bya ba ste /
T02D1413:105b-22: dbus su phrin las gang bsgrub pa'i ming spel bskul tshig dang bcas pa dgod par bya //
T02D1413:105b-23: de la lha mo rnams kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshigs pa bskyed /
T02D1413:105b-24: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstim /
T02D1413:105b-26: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du yig 'bru
T02D1413:105b-27: lha mo thams cad bstim pas 'od 'bar bar blta'o
T02D1413:105b-28: // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i phrin las 'dir bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:105b-29: mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang ni rigs bdun gyis bsdus pa de dag go //
T02D1413:105b-30: dum skyes l'a ma la sogs pa ni snying po'i bde chen gyi ta ki dag go //
T02D1413:105b-31: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1413:105b-32: zhes rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad
T02D1413:105b-33: bsdus pa'i sa bon gyi sngags nyi 'di snyid yin
T02D1413:105b-34: par grags pa bla na med pa nges par myur
T02D1413:105b-35: du grub byed kyi snying po nyid do //
T02D1413:105b-36: sa 'og gi sku'i d'a ki rnams kyi klu la sogs pas phrin las bsgrub pa /
T02D1413:105b-37: yang na mtho ris sam ni mkha' spyod thugs kyi d'a ki rnams kyi lha'i pho nyas so //
T02D1413:105b-38: de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang //
T02D1413:106a-0: zhes sa spyod gsung gi d'a ki rnams kyi gnod @106a * //
T02D1413:106a-1: sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa bran du bkol pa'i pho nyas phrin las sna tshogs byed pa'o //
T02D1413:106a-2: las ni gang dag yod pa rnams zhes pa las chen bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1413:106a-3: bsdus pa phrin las bzhi pa la sogs pa grub par byed pa'o /
T02D1413:106a-4: sngags kyis de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1413:106a-5: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste /
T02D1413:106a-6: de yang snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi go cha'i
T02D1413:106a-7: lha mo drug / mtshams ma brgyad de rnal 'byor
T02D1413:106a-8: ma bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang
T02D1413:106a-9: ldan pa dur khrod kyis yongs su bskor ba ste
T02D1413:106a-10: / de'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mnyam rjes lam du bya ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:106a-11: 'di las shin tu mchog tu gyur gang ni //
T02D1413:106a-12: ye shes zag pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang //
T02D1413:106a-13: bde ba chen po mi 'gyur ba'i gsang ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:106a-14: 'jig rten gsum ni phyi'i lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i nus pa yang 'dir 'dus la /
T02D1413:106a-15: nang gi ni dug gsum dag pa'i nyams snang nyid
T02D1413:106a-16: las phyi rol na ci yang med par sgro 'dogs
T02D1413:106a-17: chod pa'o // gsang chen bde ba mchog gi dngos
T02D1413:106a-18: grub grub pa gang phyir 'di ni bla na med
T02D1413:106a-19: de zhes thabs shes rab tha mi dad pa'i snying
T02D1413:106a-20: chod pa'o // po'o // las rnams ma lus grub byed yin //
T02D1413:106a-21: zhes las dang dngos grub 'byung ba dang 'byung ba
T02D1413:106a-22: las gyur pa'i dpang phyug phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T02D1413:106a-23: pa'o // da ni rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D1413:106a-24: bka'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba rigs bsdus pa bstan pa
T02D1413:106a-25: pa'o // ni / dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ni rigs kyi bdag po ste /
T02D1413:106a-26: rigs lnga po kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal rdo rje
T02D1413:106a-27: 'chang bde mchog 'khor lo'i rten dang brten pa'i 'khor
T02D1413:106a-28: lo las / mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no //
T02D1413:106a-29: don yongs su bsdus par bstan la tshig rgya cher ma bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:106a-30: 'dir mngon par rtogs pa ltar na /
T02D1413:106a-31: dang por rang nyid skad cig gis nyi ma la
T02D1413:106a-32: gnas pa'i he ru ka zhal gcig gis nyi ma
T02D1413:106a-34: sems bskyed sngon du 'gro bas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas la /
T02D1413:106a-35: tshogs gnyis sogs par bya ba dang /
T02D1413:106a-36: stong pa'i dang las 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs kyi steng du /
T02D1413:106b-0: @106b bh'um las byung ba'i ri bo bzang po ni /
T02D1413:106b-1: lhun po ri bo mchog rab ste /
T02D1413:106b-2: bri bar bya zhing ni yid kyi yul du blos bsam pa'o //
T02D1413:106b-3: me tog ni ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma sum cu so gnyis pa'o //
T02D1413:106b-4: 'bras bu ni lte ba la ge sar dang ldan
T02D1413:106b-5: pa sna tshogs kyis ni rdo rje rgya gram kha
T02D1413:106b-7: yang bzang po bri bya zhing ni dkyil 'khor pho
T02D1413:106b-8: brang grub bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
T02D1413:106b-9: kyi chos ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal
T02D1413:106b-11: de'i steng du rtag tu bsgom pa ni brten pa lha'i 'khor lo bstan pa la /
T02D1413:106b-12: dpa' bo rnams ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi po thams cad do //
T02D1413:106b-13: de dag gi dpa' bo chen po nyid ni rgyal ba rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang dang /
T02D1413:106b-15: rdo rje'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba'i 'khor lo pho
T02D1413:106b-16: brang chen por rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang gnyis
T02D1413:106b-17: su med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1413:106b-18: rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med pa'i gzugs
T02D1413:106b-19: can ma dang don yod rgyal po dang sbyor ba'i
T02D1413:106b-20: l'a ma dang / 'od dpag med dang /
T02D1413:106b-21: sbyor ba'i dum skyes ma dang /
T02D1413:106b-23: gnyis su med pa'i rin chen rigs kyi l'a ma dang /
T02D1413:106b-24: dbus su dpal he ru ka dang gnyis su med
T02D1413:106b-25: pa'i dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ste chos kyi
T02D1413:106b-26: dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can no //
T02D1413:106b-27: ha ha he he zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1413:106b-28: rin po che ke ke ru dang /
T02D1413:106b-31: padma r'a ga'i bum pa'i shing lo'i kha rgyan steng
T02D1413:106b-32: na thod pa bzhi dang bcas pa bdud rtsis gang
T02D1413:106b-33: ba la rab tu bzhad cing dgyes par rol pa'o
T02D1413:106b-34: // rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor du bkod pa ni /
T02D1413:106b-35: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes rigs re re
T02D1413:106b-36: la dpa' bo yab yum can bzhi bzhis yongs su
T02D1413:106b-37: bskor ba ste / so so'i 'khor lo la rdo
T02D1413:106b-38: rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje rgya gram dang
T02D1413:106b-39: padma dang rin po ches yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1413:106b-40: gtso bo la rdo rje gri gug gi phreng bas
T02D1413:106b-41: bskor ba mtshams su bum pa bdud rtsi can ka
T02D1413:106b-42: p'a la dang bcas pa nyid do //
T02D1413:106b-43: der ni dpa' bo rnams ni khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa ste /
T02D1413:106b-44: rgyan cha lugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1413:106b-45: mkha' 'gro nyid ni mtshams ma brgyad dam tshig 'khor lo bkod pa'o //
T02D1413:107a-0: dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams kyis 'gro @107a * //
T02D1413:107a-2: ces pa gsum kun du ye shes kyi rol pas
T02D1413:107a-3: phyi nang de kho na nyid du rol pas so
T02D1413:107a-4: // mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02D1413:107a-5: zhes pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba'i de nyid
T02D1413:107a-6: kyi 'gro ba gzhan don dang 'brel pa nyid ston
T02D1413:107a-7: pa'o // de las dkyil 'khor gyi dpa' bo rnams ni badzra tva la sogs nas /
T02D1413:107a-8: khanda ka p'a la'i bar du ste /
T02D1413:107a-9: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las bde stong dbyer
T02D1413:107a-10: med du bsdus pa nyid 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas
T02D1413:107a-11: dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par gdod ma nas
T02D1413:107a-12: grub pa'i dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis zhes
T02D1413:107a-13: lha drag po 'jigs byed au mar bcas pa 'dul
T02D1413:107a-14: ba ste / rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs
T02D1413:107a-15: dang gnyis su med pas bya ba kun ni 'jug
T02D1413:107a-17: dbang du bya ba nyid dang /
T02D1413:107a-18: longs spyod cing yongs su thim pa'i tshul gyis spangs
T02D1413:107a-19: pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bas
T02D1413:107a-20: ni / gdul bya'i ming ni 'dul byed la btags par shes par bya'o //
T02D1413:107a-22: rjes 'jug la sgrub pa pos mngon bar rtogs pa la /
T02D1413:107a-23: thog mar rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1413:107a-24: drug rigs drug ldan der zhugs par blta bar bya
T02D1413:107a-25: ba ni rtogs par byed pa'i dus su dang /
T02D1413:107a-26: rgyun rnal 'byor pas myur du grub cing shin tu
T02D1413:107a-27: mnyam bzhag bas zhes lam goms par bya ba la
T02D1413:107a-28: / 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom pa lha'i sku'i rnam pa gsal bar ro //
T02D1413:107a-29: rim pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pa /
T02D1413:107a-30: sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D1413:107a-31: zhes le'u so gnyis par gsungs pa dang /
T02D1413:107a-32: 'brel ba 'am de las 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1413:107a-33: ni bcom ldan 'das he ru ka nyid de 'dra
T02D1413:107a-34: ba'i bde mchog brjod ni rigs thams cad de las
T02D1413:107a-35: 'byung zhing bsdus pa'i ngo bo 'khor lo 'brel pa
T02D1413:107a-36: nyid do // de nyid snying po gsang ba grub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:107a-37: 'khor lo chen po ni dpal sngom pa rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D1413:107a-40: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gdod nas grub cing kun khyab par gnas pa lam du bya ba nyid do //
T02D1413:107a-41: 'di ni sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D1413:107a-42: dpa' bo rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bya ba thams
T02D1413:107a-43: cad dpal rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes kyi rnam
T02D1413:107b-0: @107b pa tha dad du ma yang dag par 'dus
T02D1413:107b-1: pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rjes legs par gsungs zhes
T02D1413:107b-2: che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:107b-3: lhag par gyur pa mkha' 'gro ma ni re re'i
T02D1413:107b-4: zhes lhan skyes dang zhing skyes kyi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1413:107b-5: rnams la / 'khor ni bye ba dpag tu 'gyur ba dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1413:107b-7: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i rigs /
T02D1413:107b-8: l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang /
T02D1413:107b-9: gzugs can ma rnams ni las dang padma dang rin po che'i rigs so //
T02D1413:107b-10: de dag la sogs ni rnal 'byor ma rnams la /
T02D1413:107b-11: dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin /
T02D1413:107b-12: zhes bar chad med par 'grub pa mthar phyin pa nyid do //
T02D1413:107b-14: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas nyid grub pa'i rigs
T02D1413:107b-15: bsdus chen po bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D1413:107b-17: bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:107b-20: // / khyad par gsang chen rab bsgrub cho ga sgrub pos
T02D1413:107b-21: go 'phang bde ba chen po sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul
T02D1413:107b-22: gar // skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pas
T02D1413:107b-23: mi 'chi sgron mer ldan pas grub pa'i gsang ba
T02D1413:107b-24: gar // grub par 'gyur // de la rnal 'byor
T02D1413:107b-25: pa bsam gtan mthar phyin cing sngom pa'i gsang ba
T02D1413:107b-26: gar // grub par 'gyur // spyod pa / mgon
T02D1413:107b-27: po kun du spyod pas goms par 'gyur bas ni
T02D1413:107b-29: spyod pa spros bcas dang spros med la gnas pas
T02D1413:107b-30: dngos grub shin tu myur bar byed pa skye ba
T02D1413:107b-31: bdun pa'i lus kyi cho ga'i grub pa dngos gzung
T02D1413:107b-33: ba'i phyir / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba
T02D1413:107b-34: gar // grub par 'gyur // spyod pa / / ba'i phyir / // zhes smos te /
T02D1413:107b-36: zhal gyis grub pas bdag nyid mngon shes phra mo dang ldan pas /
T02D1413:107b-37: le'u bcu gcig pa'i don bshad pa ste /
T02D1413:107b-38: bsgrub bya ni lam myur du gcod pa /
T02D1413:107b-39: ji bzhin cho ga ni dpal he ru ka dang
T02D1413:107b-40: rje btsun ma'i snying po gnyis dang rjes su 'brel
T02D1413:107b-41: pa'i don to // gang zhig gis ni gang zag
T02D1413:107b-42: de spyod pa shin tu spros med snang ba sems
T02D1413:107b-43: kyi yul du shes pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1413:107b-44: rnam shes gzhan du spro ba grong du 'jug dang
T02D1413:107b-45: 'pho ba'i nad kyis myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur
T02D1413:107b-46: ba // dbang po rab kyis tshe 'di nyid du ye shes kyi lus su sgyur bar byed pa'o //
T02D1413:107b-47: sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las //
T02D1413:108a-2: zhes pas khyad par gsang ba'i 'pho ba'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas lkog tu phrin las bya ba /
T02D1413:108a-3: s'a lu dang 'bru las gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas lam du bya ba /
T02D1413:108a-4: dud 'gro ni mi dang glang po rta bod dang /
T02D1413:108a-7: sna tshogs ni 'di dag kyang de nyid skye ba bdun rim par thob pa 'ga' zhig ste /
T02D1413:108a-8: 'di dag la so so'i rnam shes ldan par dmigs shing /
T02D1413:108a-9: lha'i 'od zer gyis 'di la d'a ki ma spyan drangs pa bstim pas ni /
T02D1413:108a-10: srog 'phrog par nus pa dang ldan par byed pa nyid kyis /
T02D1413:108a-11: phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya ba las kyi d'a ki bskul ba'o //
T02D1413:108a-12: 'di dag gi khyad par rang bzhin shes par bya ba ni /
T02D1413:108a-13: ji ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa yis //
T02D1413:108a-14: 'di dag la ni bshad par bya ba nyid de /
T02D1413:108a-15: ji ltar mi'i 'gro ba la skye ba bdun pa
T02D1413:108a-16: yod pa bzhin du dud 'gro ba la yang de
T02D1413:108a-19: mi nas mir gyur bdun pa la //
T02D1413:108a-20: rdo rje stobs mchog dangs byed pa'i //
T02D1413:108a-21: nus pa lus la rdzogs gyur te //
T02D1413:108a-23: rlung ni nam mkha' srog gsang gis //
T02D1413:108a-24: mkha' la lding zhing bdud rtsi thob //
T02D1413:108a-25: tshes brgyad zhun mer grib ma la //
T02D1413:108a-26: bdun 'gyur bya rgod rkang mig lta //
T02D1413:108a-27: de las the tsom med par 'gyur //
T02D1413:108a-28: zhes rdo rje snying po d'a ki rang 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i don to //
T02D1413:108a-29: de las skye ba bdun gyi nges pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:108a-30: skye ba gcig dang zhes pa nas /
T02D1413:108a-31: 'gro na'ang dang pa ltar dal gyis 'gro ba dang /
T02D1413:108a-33: skad kyi gang ngas snyan pa dang /
T02D1413:108a-34: gzi brjid che ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1413:108a-35: skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin //
T02D1413:108a-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis gtan la dbab pa nges pa'o //
T02D1413:108a-37: de yi snying ga'i ro tsan //
T02D1413:108a-38: zhes pa srog gis bon no //
T02D1413:108a-39: mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni //
T02D1413:108a-40: zhes pa rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pas 'khrul 'khor dang dmigs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1413:108a-41: snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas su //
T02D1413:108a-42: zhes pa yab yum gyi snying po la dpa' mo'i
T02D1413:108a-43: go cha'i sngags btags pa bskyed rim dang 'brel pa'o
T02D1413:108a-44: // rdzogs rim du rlung gis byed pa dang bsam
T02D1413:108a-45: gtan gyis gsang ba'i 'pho ba'i bya bas de'i thig
T02D1413:108a-46: le dbang du bya ba yin zhes ye shes yul
T02D1413:108b-0: @108b de nyid thob pa las phan yon ni /
T02D1413:108b-1: de ni bstan pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1413:108b-4: zhes pa'i don gyis mngon shes lnga thob cing /
T02D1413:108b-5: ye shes lus su 'gyur ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:108b-7: rang nyid dpal he ru ka'i skur gsal ba thugs
T02D1413:108b-8: ka'i sa bon la snying po gnyis pos 'khor bar
T02D1413:108b-10: bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha mdun gyi nam mkha'
T02D1413:108b-11: la spyan drangs pa la mchod pa sna tshogs phul
T02D1413:108b-12: te / de dag la gsol ba gdab pa /
T02D1413:108b-13: bdag sangs rgyas thob nas 'gro ba'i don bgyid pas /
T02D1413:108b-14: gang zag skye ba bdun pa 'di'i lus 'di bdag
T02D1413:108b-15: la gnang zhing rang dbang thob par mdzad du gsol
T02D1413:108b-17: de'i nye ba'i mtshan ma rmi lam dang nyams la gsal ba'i rtags cung zang byung ba dang /
T02D1413:108b-18: sngar byas pa'i mi dang dud 'grol sogs pa'i gzugs bdun po la dmigs pa gtad pas /
T02D1413:108b-19: lus cung zad 'gul zhing g-yo ba'am 'phar ba byung na /
T02D1413:108b-20: khams gzhan gyis bdud rtsi len pa bzhin du bya
T02D1413:108b-21: ba ni dpal dom bi he ru ka'i bzhed pa'o
T02D1413:108b-22: // yang na bdag gi sa bon las d'a ki ma bskul bas /
T02D1413:108b-23: d'a ki ma'i sku'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi
T02D1413:108b-24: snying dkar nag gi mtshams nas rnam shes srog gi
T02D1413:108b-25: thig le aa shad lta bu dang bcas pa de
T02D1413:108b-26: blangs te / mdun gyi gzugs brnyan la bstim par
T02D1413:108b-27: bya ba 'dis ni myur du grub par byed pa
T02D1413:108b-29: yang rang lhar gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od spros nas rlung rtsol drag tu byas te /
T02D1413:108b-31: de'i sgo lnga'i rnam shes la bstim nas tshur drang zhing /
T02D1413:108b-32: yang rang gi sna sgo g-yas kyi rlung phyir spro ba dang bstun te /
T02D1413:108b-33: 'od zer spros pas de'i sna sgo g-yon nas zhugs
T02D1413:108b-34: pas de'i lus kyi nus pa thams cad bsdus te
T02D1413:108b-35: / srog 'phrog pa'i thig le tshur byung bas mdun
T02D1413:108b-36: gyi gzugs brnyan de dag gi sna sgo g-yon nas
T02D1413:108b-38: de ltar yang dang yang du byas pas dmigs pa
T02D1413:108b-39: gsal bar 'gyur bas myur du grub par 'gyur ba'o
T02D1413:108b-40: // mkhas pas shing lo zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1413:108b-41: rang lus ljon shing gi rnam par bsgyur ba le'u
T02D1413:109a-0: yang phyugs nyid kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pas @109a * //
T02D1413:109a-1: le'u zhe bdun pa'i don gyi rnam par bsgyur ba nyid do //
T02D1413:109a-2: mi rnams zhes pa nas 'gog byed yin gyis log rtog dgag pa bstan /
T02D1413:109a-3: glang po rta dang nas khrung ba'i bar gyis rten
T02D1413:109a-4: 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas srid pa
T02D1413:109a-5: dag pa'i ye shes kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang
T02D1413:109a-6: las dang sdug bsngal dag pas /
T02D1413:109a-7: dus sbyor dang nyi khyim rnam par dag pas /
T02D1413:109a-9: sa ra sa nam mkha' lding sa'i dbang phyug thob pas /
T02D1413:109a-10: bzang ngan thams cad dag pa lha'i gzugs su de
T02D1413:109a-11: 'gyur ro zhes las kyi lus rnam par dag pa
T02D1413:109a-13: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin gyi bar gyis ni /
T02D1413:109a-14: 'od gsal las zung 'jug gi skur ldang ba'i che
T02D1413:109a-15: ba ston pa skad cig ma'i ye shes rnam thar
T02D1413:109a-16: sgo gsum dag pa he ru kar gyur pas bde
T02D1413:109a-17: chen mi 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par ston pa'o //
T02D1413:109a-18: le'u'i mtshan ni skye ba bdun pa bsgrub par bya ba ste zhe dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:109a-20: // / dpal ldan nyi ma'i snying pos rdo rje rnal
T02D1413:109a-21: 'byor ma yi 'khor lo don kun byed ma nyid
T02D1413:109a-23: gang du gnang la 'bebs pa'i sbyin sreg gsang ba
T02D1413:109a-24: las kyang rab dbye mchog tu bstan pa sngom pa
T02D1413:109a-25: bsdus pa nyid / ces pa'i don to //
T02D1413:109a-26: de la 'dir gong du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan dang
T02D1413:109a-27: gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa bstan par bya ba las
T02D1413:109a-28: rab 'byams kyi phrin las kyi gzhung nye bar bsdu
T02D1413:109a-30: de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni //
T02D1413:109a-32: 'di nyid don mdor bstan pa'i gsang ba ste /
T02D1413:109a-33: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi bye brag gis
T02D1413:109a-34: thun mong pa dang khyad par ba'i lha mchod pas
T02D1413:109a-35: / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1413:109a-36: nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba ni yul gang la dmigs pa thams cad do //
T02D1413:109a-37: yang dag cho ga ni spyir dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi bye brag las /
T02D1413:109a-38: 'dir ni dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mngon par
T02D1413:109a-39: rtogs pa'i phrin las gang gis ni gsang chen gyi
T02D1413:109a-40: che ba dka' ba med par /
T02D1413:109a-41: myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad //
T02D1413:109a-42: ces sngon byung dang rjes 'jug la dgongs pa'o //
T02D1413:109a-43: da ni rgyas par bshad pa la /
T02D1413:109a-44: dang por lha'i rnal 'byor ni gnas dpen par /
T02D1413:109b-0: nub mo chos kyi sku'i 'od gsal @109b gyi dang du nyal ba las /
T02D1413:109b-1: rmi lam longs sku'i tshul dang sad pa sprul pa'i sku'i tshul las sems bskyed cing /
T02D1413:109b-2: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
T02D1413:109b-3: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rjes la /
T02D1413:109b-5: gzhal yas khang gi lte bar /
T02D1413:109b-6: padma la gnas pa'i a'a li k'a li las nyi
T02D1413:109b-7: zla padma'i dbus su sa bon bam dmar ba las
T02D1413:109b-8: rdo rje gri gug 'od 'bar ba las 'de 'phros
T02D1413:109b-9: pas gdod ma nas grub pa'i dpal 'khor lo sngom
T02D1413:109b-10: pa'i lha tshogs kyi thugs rgyud bskul zhing mchod par
T02D1413:109b-11: gyur / 'od de tshur 'dus pa las dpal rje
T02D1413:109b-12: btsun ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa
T02D1413:109b-14: phyag g-yas na rdo rje gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D1413:109b-15: g-yon pa ka p'a la bdung rtsis bkang pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1413:109b-16: gru khugs su kha tv'am g-yo pa /
T02D1413:109b-17: zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pas dus mtshan dang 'jigs byed mnan pa /
T02D1413:109b-19: mgo bo rlon pa'i do shal can /
T02D1413:109b-20: rus pa'i rgyan cha lnga dang rin po ches brgyan pas /
T02D1413:109b-22: de'i phyogs bzhir d'a ki ma dang l'a ma sogs pa padma la gnas pa /
T02D1413:109b-23: phyogs bral du rin po che'i bum pa'i steng na ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba can no //
T02D1413:109b-24: de nas dam tshig 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa gsal bar bltas la /
T02D1413:109b-25: gnas gsum byin gyis brlab cing go cha bgo pa dang /
T02D1413:109b-26: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bstim pa dang dbang bskur zhing /
T02D1413:109b-27: dpal rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab cing /
T02D1413:109b-28: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi mchod bstod dang /
T02D1413:109b-29: lce par sa bon la sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
T02D1413:109b-31: lha rnams thams cad bsgom ba ni //
T02D1413:109b-33: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du me lha'i thugs kar lha tshogs gsal bar blta ba'o //
T02D1413:109b-34: thun gnyis bar du ni mchod bstod dang ldan pas
T02D1413:109b-35: sbyin sreg bya ba ni tshe dang dbang thang 'phel
T02D1413:109b-38: mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob gyur ni aa dha
T02D1413:109b-39: ri shi gha man zhes ye shes kyi sku 'thob
T02D1413:109b-40: pa'i don to // rang gi lus ni de nyid
T02D1413:109b-41: kyis zhes rnal 'byor pa tham mal pa'i lus 'di
T02D1413:110a-0: nyid yongs su dag pa'i don @110a * //
T02D1413:110a-2: / de la dang por dbang gi thab khung la dbyibs zla gam par ro //
T02D1413:110a-3: go mam sa ni ba lang dmar ser gyi sha dang /
T02D1413:110a-4: myos byed bsre ba da du ra dang do //
T02D1413:110a-5: lag pa g-yon pa la ni de'i dus su lag pa'i mchod pa dang rjes su 'brel ba ste /
T02D1413:110a-6: dgang gzar blugs gzar dang ldan pas sbyin sreg brgya tsa brgyad bya ba nyid do //
T02D1413:110a-7: me lha dmar ba'i snying gar lha yang dmar ba ste /
T02D1413:110a-8: zhag bdun la sogs par spel tshig dang ldan pas phrin las la sbyar bas sangs rgyas lta bu'am /
T02D1413:110a-9: brgya byin lta bu nus ldan yang dbang du gyur na /
T02D1413:110a-10: phran tshegs mi ni smos mi dgos //
T02D1413:110a-11: des shin tu myur par grub par byed pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:110a-13: kha chu ni ba dmar ser gyi kha nas 'bab pa ste /
T02D1413:110a-14: yang na rnal 'byor pas ga na tsa kra'i dus
T02D1413:110a-15: kyi sha lnga'i bdud rtsi zos nas skyugs pa dang
T02D1413:110a-16: / so shing bsregs pa'i thal ba de dag dang
T02D1413:110a-17: ni sbyar ba las yang 'bras phyes dril phyis byas
T02D1413:110a-18: pa'i rang gi lus mnyes pa dri ma de bzhin
T02D1413:110a-19: chags pa dang myos byed da du ra'am /
T02D1413:110a-20: yang na ma da na ming dang bcas pa ni
T02D1413:110a-21: 'di zhes bya ba a'a ksha ya me pa sha
T02D1413:110a-22: ma na ya hr'i:dza:ku ru nyo: zhes ming spel dang
T02D1413:110a-23: bcas pas / khams gsum bdag ni dbang du 'gyur
T02D1413:110a-24: ba la d'a kyi phrin las la sbyar ba phyi
T02D1413:110a-25: nang du yang dag bar grub pa'o //
T02D1413:110a-26: da ni dgug pa'i las la sbyar ba ni /
T02D1413:110a-27: rang 'byung gi ni mtshal dang ni rigs ldan grub par bya ba /
T02D1413:110a-28: rlon pa'i zas dang zos pa ni skye tshe yungs mar btsos ba skyug pa'o //
T02D1413:110a-29: mi'i bu mo gzhon nu ma'i skra dang ldan pa'i spyin sreg byas na /
T02D1413:110a-30: ming spel dang ldan pas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs
T02D1413:110a-31: pas mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin zhes thabs
T02D1413:110a-33: da ni drag po'i bye brag mdza' bo nang dbye bar bya ba ni /
T02D1413:110a-34: bsgrub bya'i skyugs pa dang yang zag pa skra dag ste /
T02D1413:110a-35: ni ma pa'i shing las sbyin sreg rab sbyar te /
T02D1413:110a-36: ming spel ba dang bi de sha ya dang rang
T02D1413:110a-37: kha lhor bltas pas me lha nag por bskyed pas
T02D1413:110a-38: mod la dbye bar 'gyur ba yin zhes nang 'thab
T02D1413:110a-40: yang drag po'i thab khung du me lha nag po'i
T02D1413:110a-41: snying gar lha'i 'khor lo bskyed pa rab mnyam bzhag
T02D1413:110a-42: pas shes / dam tshig pa la ni ye shes
T02D1413:110a-43: pa bstim par byas shing bsreg rdzas da du ra'i
T02D1413:110b-0: @110b ldum bu la bud shing bya ste /
T02D1413:110b-1: bya khva ta'i gshog pa dang /
T02D1413:110b-2: yungs mar mes gdungs ba la bsgres pa ni mchod
T02D1413:110b-3: sbyin la brgya rtsa brgyad du m'a ra ya au
T02D1413:110b-4: tsa ta ya h'um phat kyis sbyin sreg byas par
T02D1413:110b-5: gyur na ni / gdon mi za bar 'phral du 'chi ba'am /
T02D1413:110b-6: skrod par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1413:110b-7: rnal 'byor pa la pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa'i bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa ni /
T02D1413:110b-8: zas la spyod pa dang de la sogs pa rnams
T02D1413:110b-9: ni spyod lam gyi dus thams cad du sngags pas
T02D1413:110b-10: lha'i nga rgyal dus rtag tu tsham ngam gyis gsang
T02D1413:110b-11: sngags kyi bzlas brjod byed na srung ba chen po
T02D1413:110b-12: ste / de la bgegs ni yod ma yin /
T02D1413:110b-15: zhes pa'i don la 'od gsal lam du byed pa'i
T02D1413:110b-16: snying ga'i 'khor lo h'um dang thig le kha dog
T02D1413:110b-17: lnga ldan la dmigs pas lam du bya ba dpal
T02D1413:110b-18: la ba chen po'i bzhed pa'o //
T02D1413:110b-19: yang rgyas pa'i thab khud kha dog tsan dang yung
T02D1413:110b-20: ba byugs shing sgron me lnga dang bdud rtsi ldu
T02D1413:110b-21: dang ldan pa me tog ser pos mchod cing /
T02D1413:110b-22: wa'i sha'i sreg blugs brgya dbul zhing /
T02D1413:110b-23: 'bras bu can gyi yam shing gis mchod pa las /
T02D1413:110b-24: yang dag sbyin blugs byed pa'i mi ni khyad par
T02D1413:110b-25: du brjod pa rdo rje lus kyi rtsa 'khor lo
T02D1413:110b-26: rnams su lha thams cad gser mdog tu bltas la
T02D1413:110b-27: / spel tshig pushtim ku ru yang brjod pas /
T02D1413:110b-28: dus gsum du phrin las 'dir rin po che'i bye
T02D1413:110b-29: brag gis de ni zla ba gsum rjes la nus
T02D1413:110b-32: zhes mthong chos myong ba nyid do //
T02D1413:110b-33: de la rgyas pa'i thab khung dang ldan pa la
T02D1413:110b-34: sha chen po dang ma dal brten pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1413:110b-35: pas bdung rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dag gis la
T02D1413:110b-36: la zhig dbang du gyur pa myos byed ldan par
T02D1413:110b-37: ni lha mchod pa'i tshul las sbyin sreg byed pa
T02D1413:110b-38: tshogs 'khor dang 'brel pa brgya rtsa brgyad pa sreg
T02D1413:110b-39: blugs thun gsum du byed pas ni /
T02D1413:110b-40: ma lus pa rnams spyod pa ni /
T02D1413:110b-41: zhes khams gsum sa dgu zag bcas zag med du
T02D1413:110b-42: spyong pa zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur ba'i
T02D1413:110b-43: gling bzhi la sogs pa la dbyang byed pa nyid
T02D1413:110b-44: 'thob pa'o // yang lha rnams sku mdag dmar ser la /
T02D1413:111a-0: 'bras bu ldan pa'i yam shing la wa'i sha dang mngar gsum sbyar bas mchod pa @111a * //
T02D1413:111a-1: ni tshim 'gyur mkha' 'gro mas de las ni longs
T02D1413:111a-2: spyod rgyal srid ster bar gdon mi za zhes rgyas
T02D1413:111a-4: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par bya ba ni /
T02D1413:111a-5: go ma yu'i 'phral gyi shas ce sbyang ngam yang
T02D1413:111a-6: na wa'i sha dang myos byed kyis phyi dang nang
T02D1413:111a-7: gtor ma dang mchod rdzas ldan pa /
T02D1413:111a-8: nang gi sbyin sreg bya ba ni rdzas byin rlabs
T02D1413:111a-9: ldan pa dag lus kyi lha bskyed pa la mchod
T02D1413:111a-10: pa'o // me'i lha mchod pa can gyis lag par
T02D1413:111a-11: myur du ni bar chan med par dngos grub pa
T02D1413:111a-12: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes gang bsams pa grub
T02D1413:111a-13: pa'o // pa brgyad sogs / phrin las de dag
T02D1413:111a-14: thams cad la sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas
T02D1413:111a-15: pa gsang spyod dang 'brel ba ste /
T02D1413:111a-16: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha'o //
T02D1413:111a-17: yul 'khor yang ni 'khrugs par byed pa phyi dang nang du nges pa'o //
T02D1413:111a-19: de ltar nyin re byas na ni //
T02D1413:111a-20: zhes zla ba drug gi bar du thun gsum par bya'o //
T02D1413:111a-21: phan yon ni rgyal po nyid du byed 'gyur ni nus pa thob pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
T02D1413:111a-22: 'di la rab mchog gzhan dag ni 'khor lo sngom
T02D1413:111a-23: pa'i phrin las 'di nyid kyis myur du grub pa
T02D1413:111a-24: ste / 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin ni gong na med pa //
T02D1413:111a-26: rnal 'byor chen po 'tshe med ni sgrub pa po
T02D1413:111a-27: de'i tshe 'phel bar 'gyur bas rang dga' 'chi bdag
T02D1413:111a-29: sgyu ma lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ston pas te //
T02D1413:111a-30: sna tshogs gzugs ni 'gro ba mos pa'i dbang ste /
T02D1413:111a-32: yang rgyas pa'i phrin las te /
T02D1413:111a-33: bil ba ni sman ka bde /
T02D1413:111a-34: p'a la sha ni 'brum bu mngar ba /
T02D1413:111a-35: au du mw'a ra ni me tog dkar ser ro //
T02D1413:111a-36: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg la lta thams cad dmar ser ro //
T02D1413:111a-37: 'bum du byas pa na gtor ma dang mchod pa
T02D1413:111a-38: yang de tsam gyis nor gyi bdag po chen por
T02D1413:111a-39: 'gyur ba 'phags pa ngal sos bu'i mdzod thob pa
T02D1413:111a-40: lta bur rin po che dbang gi rgyal po mnga'
T02D1413:111a-41: brnyes pa'o // yang rgyal srid 'thob par 'dod cing grub pa ni /
T02D1413:111a-42: go mam sa ste ba lang sha dang spyod byed
T02D1413:111a-43: bsre ba da du ra'i 'bras bu las sbyin sreg
T02D1413:111a-44: byed pas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs par mchod pas
T02D1413:111a-45: / rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas ni dpal sngom
T02D1413:111a-46: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo bla ma dang tha
T02D1413:111a-47: mi dad pa la mchod pas /
T02D1413:111b-0: @111b dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur //
T02D1413:111b-1: zhes phan yon mi zad pa nam mkha' mdzod thob pa'o //
T02D1413:111b-2: go mam yu ni ce spyang gi sha dang zhi ba'i shing la sbyin sreg byas pa ni /
T02D1413:111b-3: gang zag des ni las dang dngos grub gang 'dod
T02D1413:111b-4: ci bde bar ni grub par 'gyur ba nyid kyis
T02D1413:111b-5: / yang go mam yu'i sbyin sreg brgya'am stod la
T02D1413:111b-6: sogs pas dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i lha tshogs la
T02D1413:111b-7: mchod pa ni myur du nor bdag mnyam par 'gyur
T02D1413:111b-8: zhes rin po che'i phung po thob pa'o //
T02D1413:111b-9: de dag 'di dus su phyi rol gyi dka' thub kyi spyod pa mthar lhung ba dgag pa ni /
T02D1413:111b-10: brtul zhugs dman pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1413:111b-11: gtsang sbra dus gsum gyi khrus la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud kyi spyod pa med pa'o //
T02D1413:111b-12: ye shes chen po gsang ba mchog bla na med
T02D1413:111b-13: pa thob pa ni brtags pa ni dngos grub 'thob
T02D1413:111b-14: cing / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1413:111b-15: da ni khyad par du sgrub pa po cho 'phel bar 'dod na /
T02D1413:111b-16: 'khrul 'khor dang rdzas gnyis las dang por bcud len du gyur pa ni /
T02D1413:111b-17: lhag pa'i tshe ni brag las skye pa can dang /
T02D1413:111b-18: kushma dam ni me'i sa bon can no //
T02D1413:111b-19: mud ga ni dpar 'phyug sa bon ma sha ni spra ba lo ma /
T02D1413:111b-20: tsa na ka ni mos sran no //
T02D1413:111b-21: sbrang rtse'i tshigs ma ni sbra tshil te /
T02D1413:111b-22: ki tshe dang zhes ra sa y'a na ste bcud len du gyur pa ste /
T02D1413:111b-23: tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i 'chi med bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba gsang ba /
T02D1413:111b-24: nang du bdud rtsi rlung lam du gyur pas so //
T02D1413:111b-26: ta ma la'i 'dab blangs de ni gur kum gyis
T02D1413:111b-27: yi ge btsugs gsum pa'i 'khor lo a'a li k'a
T02D1413:111b-28: lis mtshan pa bris pa la lha bstim zhing tshe
T02D1413:111b-30: phyi rol mu khyud las rdo rje phyogs rnams su yod par rab gnas ldan pas 'grub pa'o //
T02D1413:111b-31: gdong g-yogs byas nas zhes pa bar chad bsal zhing
T02D1413:111b-32: gnod pa bzlog pa la 'khrul 'khor da phur yis
T02D1413:111b-33: bris la / gnod pa byed pa'i spel tshig bris
T02D1413:111b-34: pa dgug bstim byas la dur khrod du sbas na
T02D1413:111b-35: bris la / / kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba
T02D1413:111b-36: gcan gzang khro bo lta bu'i kha dang lce rengs
T02D1413:111b-37: bris la / / par byed do // rnal 'byor
T02D1413:111b-38: pa rang gi ji ltar 'dod pa ni grub par
T02D1413:111b-39: bris la / / par byed do // 'gyur pa
T02D1413:111b-40: bas / gong gi las dang dngos grub ma lus
T02D1413:111b-41: bris la / / par byed do // 'gyur pa
T02D1413:111b-42: bas / pa yang ngo // gang du dga' ba
T02D1413:111b-43: bris la / / par byed do // 'gyur pa
T02D1413:111b-44: bas / pa yang ngo // der gnas so //
T02D1413:111b-45: zhes pa rim pa gnyis spyod pa gnyis spyod pa
T02D1413:112a-0: @112a * // h'a sv'a phat h'um h'um ye n'i tsa ro bee badzra aom gsang sngags so //
T02D1413:112a-1: de la gsang chen 'dir lam spyod pa yongs su
T02D1413:112a-2: dag pas phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba mngon du
T02D1413:112a-3: gyur pas / 'khor lo che na po rigs bsdus pa la goms pa mthar phyin pas /
T02D1413:112a-4: lam gyi rim pas bcu gsum gyi dbang phyug rang rdzogs su rgyur par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:112a-5: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1413:112a-7: mtshan nyid kyi theg par ji ltar sa lam thams
T02D1413:112a-8: cad 'dir don la ston cing rdzogs pa'i khyad par
T02D1413:112a-9: las rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du thabs shes rab gnyis
T02D1413:112a-10: su med pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi sa dang
T02D1413:112a-11: lam myur du chod pa nyid la gnas dang nye
T02D1413:112a-12: ba'i gnas la sogs ba chu nyis kyi ye shes
T02D1413:112a-13: rang rdzogs su gyur bar dgongs pa'o //
T02D1413:112a-14: he ru ka dpal ni dpal 'khor lo sngom pa
T02D1413:112a-15: sku ldan ye shes lnga bde chen du sngom pa
T02D1413:112a-17: de'i sku'i yan lag ni phyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo //
T02D1413:112a-18: ji ltar gnas bde nyid nang dbang dang byin rlabs
T02D1413:112a-19: kyis khyad par du gyur pa'i dus nas smin grol
T02D1413:112a-21: dpal bde mchog gi lta tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil
T02D1413:112a-22: 'khor pa thams cad lus la bstim pas de nyid
T02D1413:112a-23: du nus pa bzhag cing rtsa gnas su rnam par
T02D1413:112a-25: sku ni dkyil 'khor gyi lta tshogs ma lus pa
T02D1413:112a-26: rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang gis bsdus pa rnams so
T02D1413:112a-27: // brtan pa lha'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D1413:112a-28: g-yo ba 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa la
T02D1413:112a-29: ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid can gyis khyab cing
T02D1413:112a-30: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dbang phyug tu mdzad pa'o
T02D1413:112a-31: // de dag la d'a ki gsang ba mdzod las gsungs pa ni /
T02D1413:112a-33: rnam spyod gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang nye zhing
T02D1413:112a-34: dang nye ba'i tshan do 'du ba nye 'du nyid
T02D1413:112a-35: // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khyod 'thung gcod nye
T02D1413:112a-36: ba'i 'thung gcod sa rnams dag ste kun du 'od
T02D1413:112a-38: bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog tu dag pa
T02D1413:112a-39: gsang ba'i sa rnams dri med he ru ka dpal
T02D1413:112a-40: brjod // sa gsum dag tu dpa' bo rnams dang
T02D1413:112a-41: rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin yi ge phyin dag
T02D1413:112a-42: pa dbyer med gsang bar gnas /
T02D1413:112a-43: ma lus 'khor 'das kun du khyab cing dbang sgyur
T02D1413:112a-44: mtha' yas 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag / des mdor
T02D1413:112a-45: bstan nas da ni rgyas par bshad pa la /
T02D1413:112b-0: @112b gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02D1413:112b-2: d'a ki badzra rgya mtsho las gsung pa'i don te /
T02D1413:112b-3: gang du phyag rgya de nyid 'khor lo bzhir //
T02D1413:112b-4: sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa ni rab gang ba //
T02D1413:112b-5: bcu drug bde ba mi phye ye shes che //
T02D1413:112b-6: snying po padma ge sar rab dga' ba //
T02D1413:112b-7: rang gi bde chen gnas ni lhan cig skyes //
T02D1413:112b-8: mgo bor bdud rtsi 'phel byed phyogs dag ste //
T02D1413:112b-9: zla ba de nyid dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1413:112b-10: dag me dag gnyis ldan mdzes pa thugs spyod pa'o //
T02D1413:112b-11: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med //
T02D1413:112b-12: spyod pa chu rgyun rab 'bab rnam par dag / chos kun bde ba mi 'gyur spros med pa //
T02D1413:112b-13: ting 'dzin nyer spyod stong nyid las rlung zhi //
T02D1413:112b-14: rgyal bar mthong ba rnam thar mtshungs med thob //
T02D1413:112b-15: zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //
T02D1413:112b-16: lus gnas rtsa las sum mdor med 'bar ba //
T02D1413:112b-17: 'od zer bye bas 'gro kun khyab 'gyur ba //
T02D1413:112b-18: 'chi med rnam par dag pa'i zhing gyur ni //
T02D1413:112b-19: dpal bo stobs mchog skye med gsungs rdo rje //
T02D1413:112b-21: ye shes 'od zer de nyid spro dang sdud //
T02D1413:112b-22: skar mda' thig le gsang rab dbye nyid //
T02D1413:112b-23: smin cing 'dzag pa chu dbang nyer zhi drag / sgra las brjod pa du ma sdud pa'o //
T02D1413:112b-24: tshan do ha ni mngon gyur nyid //
T02D1413:112b-25: rnam shes spyod pas ro drug za ba ste //
T02D1413:112b-26: ye shes kyis ni zhi ba rab rgyas byed //
T02D1413:112b-27: sgyur dka' sems nyid thab 'joms pa las //
T02D1413:112b-28: 'khor lo ral gri rdzu 'phrul ston pa'o //
T02D1413:112b-29: nye ba'i tshan do sbyang dka' ba //
T02D1413:112b-30: sgyur ma rmi lam chos ni mngon du gyur //
T02D1413:112b-31: rjes 'gro chos nyid 'phags ba'i lam nyid de //
T02D1413:112b-32: dge bsam gtan mkha' 'gro khams kun spyod //
T02D1413:112b-33: gsal ba nyi ma 'char nub thim par 'gro //
T02D1413:112b-34: 'dus sa ring du song ba yin //
T02D1413:112b-35: lugs gnas lugs ni ring 'gyur spyod pa dag / phra ba rjes spyod dga' ba'i yul gyur nyid //
T02D1413:112b-36: 'od dad yon dag pa dbang po rab sim pa //
T02D1413:112b-37: don byed grong khyer dgra rnams 'dul ba'o //
T02D1413:112b-39: bla med bgrod pa seng ge stobs mchog nyid //
T02D1413:112b-40: phyir mi ldog pa mtha' dag mi 'khrugs pa //
T02D1413:112b-41: byang sems ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar du //
T02D1413:112b-42: snying rjes 'du ba rtsa gzhan bla med spyod //
T02D1413:112b-43: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid //
T02D1413:113a-0: ye shes mtshungs med legs spyod nam mkha' la / thogs med blo gros @113a * //
T02D1413:113a-2: srog dang rtsol ba dag pas rab mi gnas //
T02D1413:113a-3: 'od gsal 'gog pa med par spyod pa'o //
T02D1413:113a-4: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
T02D1413:113a-5: dba' rlabs chu 'dzin sna tshogs byams pa'i gdugs //
T02D1413:113a-6: gling rnams 'gebs pa chos nyid klor yangs te //
T02D1413:113a-7: rnam dag yang dag lam gyi snying po che //
T02D1413:113a-8: sra ba mchog 'gyur rdo rje dbyings dbang phug / yang dag mthar gnas byang chub snying po nyid //
T02D1413:113a-9: rdo rje'i ting 'dzin ye shes de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1413:113a-10: gdod nas dag gi pa spros med phyag rgya che //
T02D1413:113a-11: mnyam med bdud 'joms sgo gsum ro mnyam gyur //
T02D1413:113a-12: 'od gsal snying po srog gyur rtsa rnams dag pa ste /
T02D1413:113a-13: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje kun du ston gyur pa //
T02D1413:113a-14: mchog gyur rgyal po bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1413:113a-15: de ni khyab bdag ma lus rnam mi rtog / rgyu 'bras bde chen lhun grub bcu gsum pa //
T02D1413:113a-16: skad cig gtsug tor rdzogs par rab tham pa //
T02D1413:113a-17: rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems 'byung 'gyur //
T02D1413:113a-18: yid bzhin nor bu dbang gi rgyal po bzhin //
T02D1413:113a-19: ngo bo nyid sku ye shes zung 'jug sku //
T02D1413:113a-20: sangs rgyas nam mkha'i sku ni 'dir 'thob byed //
T02D1413:113a-22: 'dir ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa las /
T02D1413:113a-23: snying por gyur pa rdo rje'i theg pa gsang ba
T02D1413:113a-24: bla na med pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka gzhung
T02D1413:113a-26: bde ba chen por sngom pa ye shes kyi sku can gyis bstan pa'i don to //
T02D1413:113a-27: 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can la mchog tu
T02D1413:113a-28: 'gyur ba nang gi rtsa dang thig le la sogs
T02D1413:113a-29: pa'i rten 'brel phyi snang ba 'khor lo sngom pa'i
T02D1413:113a-31: de yang dbang bcu mngon du gyur pas sbyin pa
T02D1413:113a-32: nas ye shes kyi bar gyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1413:113a-34: lam rnams ni thob tshul mtshungs kyang lam bgrod tshul mi 'dra ba nyid do //
T02D1413:113a-35: rnal 'byor ma'i brda'i skad ni kla klo'i skad kyis
T02D1413:113a-36: sbas pa'i gsang ba 'jig rten gyi sgra dang rtog
T02D1413:113a-37: ge bas mi rtogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1413:113a-38: de la dkyil 'khor gsang ba yang dag pa'i gnas tshul ni /
T02D1413:113a-39: mtho ris te thugs mkha' spyod dang sa steng ni sa spyod gsungs dang /
T02D1413:113a-40: sa 'og tu spyod pa sku'i 'khor lo la dpa'
T02D1413:113a-41: ba'i yan lag ni dpal he ru'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1413:113a-43: brtan pa dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang la g-yo ba
T02D1413:113b-0: lha @113b tshogs 'khor lor gnas pa dag gi bdag
T02D1413:113b-1: ni de thams cad rnal 'byor pa'i lus sems la
T02D1413:113b-3: pulli ra sogs gang bstan pa ni sprul pa 'jam
T02D1413:113b-4: bu'i gling gi 'khor lo yul gyi bye brag tha
T02D1413:113b-5: dang ba'i // de nyid dpal he ru ka yab
T02D1413:113b-6: yum gyi sku la gnas pa bzhin du rnal 'byor
T02D1413:113b-7: pa'i lus la yang sbyar ba'o //
T02D1413:113b-8: thog med dus su gang bstan pa ni gdod nas
T02D1413:113b-9: grub pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1413:113b-12: 'dzam bu'i gling du yang snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1413:113b-13: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas pa ni kun du khyab cing lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D1413:113b-14: thogs pa med par kun gyi dbang phyug tu bstan
T02D1413:113b-15: pas gar gyi cho 'phrul ni dpal ldan khrag 'thung
T02D1413:113b-16: rgyal po che ni dus dang rnam pa thams cad
T02D1413:113b-17: du bdud las rgyal ba'i sku gtso bor 'gyur ba'o
T02D1413:113b-18: // 'dod pa kun ni sgrub pa pos don kun stsol ba nying las /
T02D1413:113b-19: dbang phyug gi gtso ni ye shes kyi dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pa nyid do //
T02D1413:113b-20: kun du phyag dang ni zla ba bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa /
T02D1413:113b-21: zhabs ldan zhing ni nyi ma lho byang du 'grod pa gnyis so //
T02D1413:113b-22: kun du spyan dang ni dus gsum thams cad dus med mnyam par nyid du gzigs pa'o //
T02D1413:113b-23: gtsug ror zhal te gtsug tor bltar ma mngon pa dang /
T02D1413:113b-24: zhal gyis khyab pa tshad med pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba /
T02D1413:113b-25: kun du thos ldan ni gsung gi gsang ba bde
T02D1413:113b-26: chen bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskal pa gangg'a'i klung
T02D1413:113b-27: gi bye ma snyed bcu drug 'das pa'i 'jig rten
T02D1413:113b-28: gyi khams 'od zer can la sogs par yang gsung
T02D1413:113b-31: rnam par bzhugs pa ni sku gsung thugs ye shes
T02D1413:113b-32: kyi gsang ba bde chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
T02D1413:113b-33: mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los 'khor 'das thams
T02D1413:113b-34: cad kyi don mdzad pa nyid do //
T02D1413:113b-35: da ni gzhung nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas lam
T02D1413:113b-36: grub pa'i don bstan pa ni de nas dngos grub
T02D1413:113b-37: bya ba ni 'bras bu'i mchog gsang ba mchog thun
T02D1413:113b-38: mong ngo // bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te
T02D1413:113b-39: ni lam gyi rim pas dam tshig sngom pa spyod
T02D1413:113b-40: pa dang ldan pa mthar 'byin pa'o //
T02D1413:113b-41: sgrub pa pos rten gyi gang zag nyams len byed
T02D1413:113b-42: pa la phan pa'i phyir zhes pa ma 'ongs pa'i
T02D1413:113b-43: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la dgongs pa nyid
T02D1413:114a-2: gsang ba chen po rgyud gsum ston pa'i de nyid
T02D1413:114a-3: gsal bar gsungs pa yin zhes snying po mchog tu
T02D1413:114a-4: gyur pa'i don gsang chen la nye bar gdams pa
T02D1413:114a-6: da ni le'u'i mtshan las dpal 'khor lo sngom pa la /
T02D1413:114a-9: gnas la sogs pa bstan pa'i cho ga ni sa lam rim pa ste /
T02D1413:114a-10: le'u lnga bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1413:114a-12: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1413:114a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1413:114a-14: 'dir ni yongs su bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di la /
T02D1413:114a-15: rjod byed sgra'i gsang chen dang brjod bya don gyi
T02D1413:114a-16: sang chen gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po
T02D1413:114a-17: // ye shes kyi gsang chen gyi don ma lus pa thams cad le'u dang por mdor bstan pa /
T02D1413:114a-18: lus rnam par gzhag pa lta bur gsungs nas /
T02D1413:114a-19: le'u gnyis pa nas zhe dgu pa yan chad kyis
T02D1413:114a-20: brgyad par bshad la le'u lnga bcu pas las rab
T02D1413:114a-21: 'byams rnams dang / lam dang sa'i rim pa bstan pas cung zad bsdu ba tsam mdzad nas /
T02D1413:114a-22: le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa 'dis tshig don thams cad nye bar bsdu ba mdzad pa ni /
T02D1413:114a-23: man ngag ni dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nas
T02D1413:114a-24: da lta'i bla ma'i bar du byin rlabs mchog tu
T02D1413:114a-25: gyur pa'i rgyud 'di ni skal ba dang mi ldan
T02D1413:114a-26: pas rnyed par dka' ba ste /
T02D1413:114a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa mar mdzad nas /
T02D1413:114a-28: thub pa 'od srungs kyis kyang ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1413:114a-29: de bas na thub pa thugs rje che zhing thabs
T02D1413:114a-30: mkhas pas dpa' bos zhes dpal he ru ka'i brda'i
T02D1413:114a-31: skad du ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par
T02D1413:114a-32: gsang ba snying po'i don lkog tu gyur pa de
T02D1413:114a-33: bzhin gshegs pa spyod yul nyid thun mong pa ma
T02D1413:114a-35: nga yis rgyud gzhan rnams thams cad du yang gsal por ma bstan te /
T02D1413:114a-36: shin tu sbas pa yin zhes skra pa dang rtog
T02D1413:114a-37: ge pas rtogs par dka' pa kla klo'i skad la
T02D1413:114a-38: sogs pa'i sgo nas bstan pa ste /
T02D1413:114a-39: rim pa gnyis mngon du gyur pa'i tshul gyi gzhung bsdu ba spyir mdzad pa'o //
T02D1413:114a-40: da ni mngon par rtogs pa yongs su bsdu ba'i don gyi gsang ba ston pa ni /
T02D1413:114a-41: gos dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1413:114a-42: bh'a sm'a shes zhes dur khrod las byung ba'i gos sam /
T02D1413:114a-43: pashthi dza'i sgras gnas la 'gro bas /
T02D1413:114b-0: dur khrod kyis dben @114b par gnas phun sum tshogs pa'am /
T02D1413:114b-1: tshad med pa bstan pa nyid kyis rnal 'byor srung ba dang /
T02D1413:114b-2: bdag nyid skad cig gis dpal he ru ru ka
T02D1413:114b-3: la phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa la sogs kyis bdag
T02D1413:114b-4: bsrung ba dang / yang sogs kyis yan lag bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
T02D1413:114b-5: shes rab kyi yan lag ye shes kyi tshogs dang /
T02D1413:114b-6: phur bu gur gyi gnas bsrung ba sngon du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1413:114b-7: rgyu tshogs ni rten 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri ra ba chen po gzhal yas kyang bskyed pa la /
T02D1413:114b-8: brten pa lha'i 'khor lo bskyed pa la /
T02D1413:114b-9: stong pa sngon 'gro ste a'a li dang /
T02D1413:114b-10: k'a li ste sa bon phyag mtshan la sogs mngon par byang chub pa nyid dang /
T02D1413:114b-11: brjod nas sngon du 'gro bas yongs su rdzogs pa
T02D1413:114b-12: las byang chub pa rgyu'i he ru ka bskyed pa
T02D1413:114b-13: nyid dang / 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa 'bras bu'i he ru ka bskyed pa nyid las /
T02D1413:114b-14: ji srid bsdus pa nam mkha' nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas bstim pa las /
T02D1413:114b-15: sum gyi chos 'byung du lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa las /
T02D1413:114b-16: dam tshig gi 'khor lo phyung nas bkod pas spro ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:114b-17: mya ngan las 'das pa gtso bo yab yum 'od kyi thig ler zhu ba dang bdud rtsi ste /
T02D1413:114b-18: thig le'i rang bzhin du gnas pa la tshim byed
T02D1413:114b-19: tshad med bzhi'i ngang las gnas pa la glus bskul
T02D1413:114b-20: ba dang / bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan gtso bo yab
T02D1413:114b-21: yum bzhed par gyur pas sbyor ba dang po'i ting
T02D1413:114b-23: go cha chen po lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1413:114b-24: myang 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
T02D1413:114b-26: las rgyal po mchog la lag pa'i mchod pas go cha gnyis bgo ba dang /
T02D1413:114b-27: bsdus pa'i sbyor bas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par bstim pa dang /
T02D1413:114b-28: dbang bskur zhing rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /
T02D1413:114b-29: sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa bla na med pa
T02D1413:114b-30: bstan pas mnyam gzhag gi rnal 'byor de ltar de
T02D1413:114b-32: zhes pa mngon par rtogs pa he ru ka mngal skyes bstan pa la /
T02D1413:114b-33: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin //
T02D1413:114b-34: zhes thun nye bar bsdus nas bdud rtsi myang zhing gtor ma dbul bar bya ba dang /
T02D1413:115a-0: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i bar @115a * //
T02D1413:115a-1: gyis mnyam gzhag gi rnal 'byor bstan /
T02D1413:115a-2: de nas rjes thob spyod pa la gnas par bya ba'o //
T02D1413:115a-3: yang rdzus skyes kyi rim pa ltar na dang por
T02D1413:115a-4: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1413:115a-5: nga rgyal dang ldan pas lus dag yid gsum dag
T02D1413:115a-6: par byas nas / gos dang zhes tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa rnal 'byor srung ba'o //
T02D1413:115a-7: phyag rgya lnga ni phyung po lnga rigs lngas rgyas
T02D1413:115a-8: gdab sogs khongs su khams dang skye mched bsdu bas
T02D1413:115a-9: bdag bsrung ba'o // phur bu gur ni gnas bsrung ba'o //
T02D1413:115a-10: pra dzny'a pu nya'i sgras ni shes rab kyis zin
T02D1413:115a-11: pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa yan
T02D1413:115a-13: rgyu sogs stong pa sngon 'gro ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D1413:115a-14: 'jug pa ni sgra des gzhom du med pa'i n'a da la sogs pa be ram bha ste /
T02D1413:115a-15: ji srid bsdu ba'i sbyor pa ni 'byung rim brtsegs nas ri rab dang sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1413:115a-16: a'a li k'a li thig le las sa bon dang
T02D1413:115a-17: bcas pa spro ba dang bsdu bas ngo bo nyid
T02D1413:115a-18: sku'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par skyed pa'o
T02D1413:115a-19: // mya ngan 'das zhi byang chub phyogs chos sku'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1413:115a-20: go cha chen pos ni lus rten dang brten dang
T02D1413:115a-21: brten par bcas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan
T02D1413:115a-22: pa dang / lag pa'i mchod pa ste go cha gnyis bgo ba dang /
T02D1413:115a-23: sdud pa'i sbyor ldan pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par bya ba dang /
T02D1413:115a-24: dbang bskur ba dang sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya ba phyi dang /
T02D1413:115a-25: gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod bstad bya ba dang /
T02D1413:115a-26: sngags rnams zhes pas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor yang bstan
T02D1413:115a-27: bdud rtsi tshim byed kyi bdud rtsi myang ba gtor
T02D1413:115a-28: ma dbul ba dang yang bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pas
T02D1413:115a-29: thun nye bar bsdu ba yang bstan to //
T02D1413:115a-30: des bskyed pa'i don gzhung bsdu ba de kho na nyid ston pa'o //
T02D1413:115a-31: da ni nyid la rdzogs pa'i rim pa ltar na /
T02D1413:115a-32: khyad par du rnal 'byor rnam par grol ba las /
T02D1413:115a-33: gos ni lus kun du khyab pa'i kun da byang
T02D1413:115a-34: sems de la brten pa'i don dam pa bde bas
T02D1413:115a-35: kun du khyab pas gos sam gnas su gyur pa'o
T02D1413:115a-36: / phyag rgya lnga ni 'byung ba lnga dang dug dag pa'i ye shes lnga nyid do //
T02D1413:115a-37: sogs ni rtsa 'khor lo drug la sogs pa dbye bsdu rnams so //
T02D1413:115b-0: shes rab yan lag @115b ni las dang chos dam tshig phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-1: phur bu gur ni rdo rje dra gus lta bu ste /
T02D1413:115b-2: byang chub sems kyi phur bus srung ba chen po'o //
T02D1413:115b-3: a'a li k'a li ni rtsa 'khor lo bzhi yig 'bru dgod pa rnams so //
T02D1413:115b-4: brjod pa ni rlung srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02D1413:115b-5: rgyu ni chos nyid kyi rtsva kun 'dar ma'o //
T02D1413:115b-6: sogs ni ro rkyang gnyis dang gzhan rtsa thams cad do //
T02D1413:115b-7: bde ba dang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes skye
T02D1413:115b-8: ba'i rten rtsa dbu de nyid dang po lus chags
T02D1413:115b-9: pa'i thog mar dang po byung bas na sngon 'gro
T02D1413:115b-10: ba'o // 'jug ba ni rlung lam du bya ba ste 'byung 'jug gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-11: sgra la sogs pa ni rlung dang rtsa yig khong na gnas pa las /
T02D1413:115b-14: rab tu byed pa du ma 'byung ba gnas pa thim pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-15: ji sring ni srid pa gsum ste rtsa gsum mtshon pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-16: sdus pa ni rtsa dbus ma dang aa thung las /
T02D1413:115b-17: mi shigs pa'i thig le gnas pa las 'od zer spro ba dang sdud pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-18: de nyid khams gzhan gyi bdud rtsi blangs nas rang
T02D1413:115b-19: gi gnas su bsdus pas ye shes myur du skye
T02D1413:115b-20: ba'o // sbyor ldan pa ni lte ba'o 'og gi
T02D1413:115b-21: tsanda l'i dang steng gi spyi bo'i lham las bdud
T02D1413:115b-22: rtsi phab ste 'khor lo rnams su rim pa bzhin
T02D1413:115b-23: ba'o // du sbyor ba'o // de nyid la 'bar
T02D1413:115b-24: 'dzag tu gyur pas bdud rtsi ni spyi bo'i ham
T02D1413:115b-25: ba'o // du sbyor ba'o // las so // tshim byed ni 'bar ba la thim pas /
T02D1413:115b-26: lus sems la bde stong lhan cig skyes /
T02D1413:115b-28: mya ngan 'das ni nyen mongs pa dang rnam par
T02D1413:115b-29: rtog pa thams cad bsregs pas bde stong du rang
T02D1413:115b-31: lag pa ni phyag rgya ste de dag thams cad la yang phyag rgya bzhi ldan du gnas pas /
T02D1413:115b-32: mchod pa ni rang lus thabs he ru ka bde ba dang /
T02D1413:115b-34: thabs shes rab gnyis med ye shes chen po mchod pa'o //
T02D1413:115b-35: dbang bskur ba ni dga' ba dang skad cig ma
T02D1413:115b-36: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis de kho na
T02D1413:115b-37: nyid du dbang bskur ba nyid do //
T02D1413:115b-38: go cha chen po ni lus kyi gnas dang /
T02D1413:115b-39: nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa thams cad du dpa'
T02D1413:115b-40: bo thabs dang rnal 'byor ma shes rab dbyer med
T02D1413:115b-41: gyur pas rtsa dang byang sems ro mnyam bde chen
T02D1413:115b-42: mi rtogs par gnas pas bdud bzhi la sogs pa
T02D1413:116a-2: sngags rnams ni 'byung ba lnga'i rlung ste srog rtsol
T02D1413:116a-3: la sbyangs pas dbu mar chud pas snang grags thams
T02D1413:116a-4: cad bdag gzhan dbyer med bde ba dang stong ba
T02D1413:116a-5: gnyis med kyi mchod par bya ba nyid de /
T02D1413:116a-6: de dag gis lam rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba dpal dom bi he ru ka'i bzhed pa'o //
T02D1413:116a-7: da ni de dag gi gzhung yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul gyis gdams pa ni /
T02D1413:116a-8: b'a sa ni zhes gnas dang gos la 'jug pas /
T02D1413:116a-9: sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i gzhung bsdu ba'o //
T02D1413:116a-10: dbang gi gzhung bsdu ba ni dbang bskur ba zhes pa'o //
T02D1413:116a-11: lam skyed pa'i rim pa'i de nyid bcu bzhi po
T02D1413:116a-12: thams cad kyis bstan yang rdzogs rim kyang de nyid
T02D1413:116a-13: kyis so // rdzogs rim phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02D1413:116a-14: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya //
T02D1413:116a-16: dam tshig la gnyis las bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni
T02D1413:116a-17: gang gis thob nas ma dad pa dbul po sdug
T02D1413:116a-18: bsngal gyis gdungs pa de la rtag tu 'byung bar
T02D1413:116a-19: 'gyur // de la nyes dmigs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:116a-20: bdud rtsi tshim byed kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus
T02D1413:116a-21: su yang lag pa'i mchod pa zhes pas bza' ba'i
T02D1413:116a-22: dam tshig gi gzhung bsdu ba'o //
T02D1413:116a-25: mgul rgyan gdu bu sogs tshig rkang bzhis rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1413:116a-26: spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzod kyis kun du bzang
T02D1413:116a-27: po mgon po kun spyod sbas pa aa wa dh'u
T02D1413:116a-29: phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bsdus pa'i spyod pa yang bsdus pa'o //
T02D1413:116a-30: a'a li k'a li dang sngags rnams kun gyi zhes
T02D1413:116a-31: gsang sngags snying po nye snying rtsa sngags bzlas pa'i
T02D1413:116a-32: don to // shes rab yan lag dang /
T02D1413:116a-33: mchod par bya zhes pas rig ldan mchod pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D1413:116a-34: lam mngon du gyur pa la sbyangs thob gnyis las /
T02D1413:116a-35: spang bya rang sar dag par gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:116a-36: ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi //
T02D1413:116a-37: bag chags kun zad mtshan nyid can //
T02D1413:116a-39: 'bras bu mngon du gyur ba la //
T02D1413:116a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //
T02D1413:116a-41: sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug //
T02D1413:116a-42: ces pas ye shes sa lam rdzogs pa'i gzhung bsdu pa'o //
T02D1413:116b-0: da ni dpal 'khor lo @116b sngom pa'i rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1413:116b-1: 'bras bu mchog mngon du gyur ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:116b-2: mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa //
T02D1413:116b-4: 'dir rten gyi gang zag gis thos bsam bsgom pas rgyud sbyangs pas lam la goms par gyur bas /
T02D1413:116b-5: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag bdag mi las
T02D1413:116b-6: dang nyon mongs pa gnas dan len myur du bdag
T02D1413:116b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing ni sa bcu
T02D1413:116b-9: gsum pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe 'di
T02D1413:116b-10: nyid la mngon du gyur ba dbang po yang rab
T02D1413:116b-11: ste / sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug //
T02D1413:116b-12: ces pa la phra zhing yang la phra bar nus pa dang //
T02D1413:116b-13: spyod pa nus dang bdag nyid chen po dang //
T02D1413:116b-14: dga' mgur byed cing thams cad dbang du gyur //
T02D1413:116b-15: ces 'dod bskyed dang dbang phyug don brgyad do zhes pa'i don gyi mtshungs pa med pa'o //
T02D1413:116b-16: yang skye ba bdun tshun chod kyis mchog mngon du gyur ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:116b-17: ji ltar sngon tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas
T02D1413:116b-18: bsags pa'i sdig pa dang ma rig pa'i bag chags
T02D1413:116b-19: kun zad par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can ni /
T02D1413:116b-20: brtson 'grus ldan pa gang zhig gis 'di ni dus rtag tu bsgom bdag ni /
T02D1413:116b-21: skye ba dang ni gang dang gang du skye ba
T02D1413:116b-22: der bde bar gshegs pa dag gi rigs skye ste
T02D1413:116b-23: / khyad par du rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:116b-24: dang po nas chos dang ldan pa nyid la ste /
T02D1413:116b-25: dbang po rab kyis thob pa'o //
T02D1413:116b-26: da ni mtshan tsam gyis grol ba dri ma dag tshul dpa'i sgo nas bstan pa /
T02D1413:116b-27: dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod //
T02D1413:116b-28: ces bum pa lta bu de nyid me 'bar ba'i dbus su bzhag par gyur na ni /
T02D1413:116b-29: mar 'bru las byung ba'am srog chags las byung ba'i
T02D1413:116b-30: dang sam steng du zhu bar gyur cing snyigs ma
T02D1413:116b-31: lus pa phyed cing snod de nyid kyi dri ma
T02D1413:116b-32: 'jig pa nyid du 'byung ba dri ma thams cad
T02D1413:116b-33: myur du bdag pa'i khyad par bstan pa las /
T02D1413:116b-34: don ni de bzhin shr'i he ru ka'i zhes pa la /
T02D1413:116b-35: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1413:116b-36: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1413:116b-37: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02D1413:116b-38: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1413:116b-39: zhes pa'i don gyis rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung
T02D1413:116b-40: thugs skad cig ma bzhi ba mngon par rdzogs par
T02D1413:116b-41: byang chub pa snying pho ye shes mngon du gyur
T02D1413:117a-0: ba'o // mtshan thos pa tsam gyis @117a * //
T02D1413:117a-1: skad cig la sgrib pa 'jig par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:117a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu sbyangs pa can gyi spyod yul du gyur ba'o //
T02D1413:117a-3: bsam gtan ni thun bzhi la sogs par ro //
T02D1413:117a-4: 'di nyid yid la sems pa tsam gyis sam mos
T02D1413:117a-5: pa byas pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan du ma
T02D1413:117a-6: thob la / glegs bam du bklag cing kha don du 'don pa dang bris shing bcangs pas ni /
T02D1413:117a-7: phan yon gyi khyad par mtho ris yan lag dang
T02D1413:117a-8: ldan pa'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur
T02D1413:117a-9: ba'am zhes gnas skabs pa la /
T02D1413:117a-10: yang na stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen
T02D1413:117a-11: po rtsibs kyi mu khyud lta bu 'thob ces dbang
T02D1413:117a-13: tshe 'dir mchog ma thob na'ang bar ma dor dkyil
T02D1413:117a-14: 'khor lo'i snang ba dang mi 'bral bar dag pa'i
T02D1413:117a-15: zhing khams su spyod par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:117a-18: sgrub pa po rim pa gnyis la rtags sna 'ga' tsam las ma thob na yang /
T02D1413:117a-19: bar ma dor zhal ston par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1413:117a-20: dpal ldan khrag 'thung ni bcom ldan 'das nyid rdo rje btsun mo dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1413:117a-21: sogs ni dpa' bo rnams thams cad dang /
T02D1413:117a-22: mkha' 'gro sa gsum na gnas pa thams cad yul
T02D1413:117a-23: nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang 'og min na bzhugs pa'i
T02D1413:117a-24: lha tshogs kyis lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs
T02D1413:117a-25: pa ste / lha rdzas kyi me tog padma dang /
T02D1413:117a-29: manydzu sha ka la sogs pas mchod par byed /
T02D1413:117a-30: lha'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs du ma dang /
T02D1413:117a-31: ba da na sna tshogs pa du ma dang gdugs
T02D1413:117a-32: dang bla re chen po dang 'phan la sogs pa
T02D1413:117a-33: dang / rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs pa dung dang rdo po che dang gand'i dang /
T02D1413:117a-40: dril bu la sogs pa du ma sgrogs par byed cing /
T02D1413:117a-41: sna tshogs klu'i mchod pas mchod pa ni drug ldan
T02D1413:117a-42: dang bzhi 'gyur la sogs pa rdo rje'i dbyangs yid
T02D1413:117a-43: du 'ong ba du ma ni lha mo'i tshogs thams
T02D1413:117a-44: cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1413:117a-45: tshu rol pa rnams kyis 'chi ba zhes bya ba rtags tsam du bas kyi /
T02D1413:117b-0: sgrub pa po la 'chi ba med pas bde ba'i snang ba las @117b ma 'das te /
T02D1413:117b-1: rnam rtog 'di zhes gzhan dag rnams kyi 'khrul snang yen no //
T02D1413:117b-2: mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khrid pa ni lus
T02D1413:117b-3: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i rnam pa la sems ye shes
T02D1413:117b-4: bde stong du gyur ba nyid kyis zag pa med
T02D1413:117b-6: des ni dbang po 'bring gi lam mngon du bya ba'o //
T02D1413:117b-7: phan yon de dag kyang phal pa rnams la 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02D1413:117b-8: de 'dra'i dpal chen de sgrub pa po dang /
T02D1413:117b-9: rnal 'byor ba lus dag yid lha'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1413:117b-10: rdo rje dang tha mi dad du gyur ba dag
T02D1413:117b-11: sa steng nas ni rnyed par dka' ba ste au
T02D1413:117b-12: du mw'a ra lta bu srid pa tsam du bstan
T02D1413:117b-13: pa'o // da ni bsrung bya'i dam tshig las dpal
T02D1413:117b-14: ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen 'di la dang por
T02D1413:117b-15: pa'o // zhugs shing / dbang thob pa chos thos nas //
T02D1413:117b-16: gang gis bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha dang gsang ba'i spyod pa dang /
T02D1413:117b-17: mchod rdzas brten pa la sogs pa la rang bzhin
T02D1413:117b-18: shes nas ma dad pas dam tshig ma bsrungs na
T02D1413:117b-19: / tshe 'di la dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung
T02D1413:117b-20: ba la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba du ma
T02D1413:117b-21: / 'byung la / skye ba phyi ma de la
T02D1413:117b-22: dus rtag tu sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'byung
T02D1413:117b-24: dam tshig las 'das pa'i skyon pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:117b-25: da ni mngon par rtogs pa sgom pa'i gzhung bsdu ba las /
T02D1413:117b-26: dang por rdzus skyes rim pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:117b-27: ri steng ni 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs kyi steng du ri bo mchog rab po //
T02D1413:117b-28: sna tshogs padma ni 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1413:117b-29: pa de'i lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su
T02D1413:117b-30: padma 'dab ma brgyad par gnas pa la /
T02D1413:117b-31: yi ge sa bon tsam las a'a li k'a li skyes ni dbyangs dang /
T02D1413:117b-32: gsal byed kyi dbus su h'um 'od 'phro ba las /
T02D1413:117b-33: spro bsdu nas skad cig gis gzhal yas khang lha'i
T02D1413:117b-34: 'khor lo lnga ldan du bcas pa rdzogs byed du
T02D1413:117b-36: dpal he ru zhabs g-yas brkyang bas lha mo au ma dus mtshan mo mnan cing /
T02D1413:117b-37: zhabs g-yon pas de'i bdag po 'jigs byed sum bltab
T02D1413:117b-38: tu rnam par gnon cing ste chad pa dang rtag
T02D1413:117b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dang po gnyis
T02D1413:117b-41: kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum rdo
T02D1413:117b-42: rje rnal 'byor ma'i sku la 'khyud cing mnyam sbyor
T02D1413:118a-0: ba'o // nyi shu rtsa bzhi phyed ldan pa na phyag bcu @118a * //
T02D1413:118a-1: gnyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang sa bcu gnyis rdzogs
T02D1413:118a-2: pas bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa la gnas pa'o
T02D1413:118a-3: // 'ga' zhig gis lha bcu gsum pa'i tshig zin du 'dod pa'ang yod do //
T02D1413:118a-4: dpa' bo ni sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1413:118a-5: rnal 'byor ma tshogs d'a ki ma sum cu rtsa drug gis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1413:118a-6: de rnams kyi sku'i rgyan ni /
T02D1413:118a-7: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo thod pa lnga nor bu dang ldan pa mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1413:118a-8: mgul rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya /
T02D1413:118a-9: lag pa gdu bu dpung rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya /
T02D1413:118a-10: rna rgyan 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya /
T02D1413:118a-11: tshangs pa'i skud pa mchod phyir thogs dang ska rags
T02D1413:118a-12: 'og pags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa ni dam tshig
T02D1413:118a-14: thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag nyid do //
T02D1413:118a-15: do shal mgo bo'o phreng ba ni mi mgo khrag
T02D1413:118a-16: 'dzag pa can lnga bcu thag pa rgyu mas byas
T02D1413:118a-17: pa 'du byed lnga bcu dag pa'i brda'o //
T02D1413:118a-18: sh'i he ru ka phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D1413:118a-19: bcom ldan 'khor lo lnga'i dbus na sku lnga bde chen du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1413:118a-20: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1413:118a-21: zhes pas dngos grub thams cad sgrub par 'dod pas thun bzhi rim pas gnas par bya ba'o //
T02D1413:118a-22: da ni mang la skyes ltar na khyad par ni
T02D1413:118a-23: dpa' bo nyer bzhi po kun dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D1413:118a-24: sum cu so drug pa'i 'khor lo lnga ldan du
T02D1413:118a-25: gyur ba bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpal
T02D1413:118a-26: he ru ka yab yum sbyor ldan bsrubs bas pa
T02D1413:118a-27: las byung ba'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga las
T02D1413:118a-28: byung ba rgyu'i he ru ka rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1413:118a-29: 'byin pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du bkod pas /
T02D1413:118a-30: sdud pa gtso bo yan yum zhu ba ni stong
T02D1413:118a-31: nyid 'ong gsal du 'jug par mdzad pa yin zhes
T02D1413:118a-32: thig le'i gzugs su gnas pa la /
T02D1413:118a-33: mtshams kyi lha mo'i glus bskul bas lha tshogs thams
T02D1413:118a-34: cad dgyes pas khyab par gyur cing gnyis med 'gyur
T02D1413:118a-35: ba 'bras bu'i he ru ka slar bzhengs pa nyid
T02D1413:118a-36: cho ga bla na med pa ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D1413:118a-37: du bstan pa'o // de las bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1413:118a-38: gdul bya 'gro ba rnams kyi mos pa'i bye brag
T02D1413:118a-39: dang dbang po'i bye brag tha dad pa du ma'i
T02D1413:118b-0: sems can la sku'i rnam @118b par 'phrul ba gang
T02D1413:118b-2: spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de ni zhi ba
T02D1413:118b-3: dang khro bo dang nyan rang dang bo dhi stva
T02D1413:118b-4: rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang zhal gdong brnyan mi 'dra
T02D1413:118b-5: bar gar gyi rol pas sna tshogs tshul gyis thun
T02D1413:118b-6: mong dang khyad par gyis 'khor ba ma stongs par
T02D1413:118b-7: du gdul bya nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la thabs
T02D1413:118b-8: ni sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i spros ba dang
T02D1413:118b-9: / yang spros pa med pa zab pa dang /
T02D1413:118b-10: rgya che ba du ma ston pa yin zhes snod dang 'tsham par ro //
T02D1413:118b-11: da ni gsang chen bla na med pa zab mo
T02D1413:118b-12: snying po'i chos 'di ni he ru ka ngas ston
T02D1413:118b-14: mos par ma gyur kyang zhes dbang po dman pas
T02D1413:118b-15: 'di la mi 'jug na yang smod pa dag tu
T02D1413:118b-16: mi bya ste / tshar bcad pa'i spyod yul lo //
T02D1413:118b-17: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya ni thams cad
T02D1413:118b-18: la blo'i yul las 'das pa phyag rgya chen po
T02D1413:118b-19: yid la mi byed pa la gnas par bya ba'o
T02D1413:118b-20: // yang gang zag gang gis chos 'di bdag gis
T02D1413:118b-21: rtogs pa'i spyod yul min pas sus kyang 'di'i don
T02D1413:118b-22: mngon du gyur pa med pa'i shes byed ni /
T02D1413:118b-23: bdag gis chos 'di'i chos nyid ni ma rtogs pas
T02D1413:118b-24: gzhan dag kyang ma shes pa yin no zhes zer
T02D1413:118b-25: pa can ni ma rtogs pa ste /
T02D1413:118b-26: gang gis mngon du byed pa bstan pa rdzogs sangs
T02D1413:118b-27: rgyas dang zhes dbang po yang rab dang de'i sras
T02D1413:118b-28: ni byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rab dang 'bring
T02D1413:118b-29: pa rnams dang bdag nyid chen po gang zag thod
T02D1413:118b-30: rgal ba rnal 'byor dbang phyug tu gyur ba rnams
T02D1413:118b-31: kyis mkhyen cing mngon du gyur par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1413:118b-32: de la chos thams cad chos nyid lhun grub 'gyur ba med par ston pa'i phyir /
T02D1413:118b-33: sangs rgyas rnams ni byon rgyur tam //
T02D1413:118b-34: zhes 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu
T02D1413:118b-35: med pa byon nas chos dpag tu med pa gsungs
T02D1413:118b-36: pa'am / ma byon na yang chos mang po ma
T02D1413:118b-37: gsungs na yang dus dang rnam pa kun du de
T02D1413:118b-38: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ye
T02D1413:118b-39: shes bde ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D1413:118b-40: dpal bde mchog gi 'khor lo'i chos nyid kyi ngo
T02D1413:118b-41: bo nyid dbyings ye shes dbyer med la ni 'phel
T02D1413:118b-42: 'grib spangs pa ste zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas
T02D1413:118b-43: pa brjod pa las 'das pa nyid do //
T02D1413:118b-44: de ltar chos ni tshig dang don du bcas pa /
T02D1413:119a-0: brjod bya'i gsang ba dang rjod byed kyi @119a * //
T02D1413:119a-1: gsang chen 'di la lung dang rigs pas rnam par
T02D1413:119a-2: gzhal nas kyang zhes gang zag dbang po rnon po
T02D1413:119a-3: la dgongs nas gsang chen byin rlabs gsang ba mchog
T02D1413:119a-4: tu gyur pa bstan pa la /
T02D1413:119a-5: 'jig rten pa tha snyad pa dngos po la mtshan mar 'dzin pa kun gyis yong mi smad de /
T02D1413:119a-6: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs kyi spros pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1413:119a-7: khyad par snying po gsang ba de'i 'grong pa lam
T02D1413:119a-8: myur zhing bde ba'i lam mchog 'dir bsams shing zhes
T02D1413:119a-9: chos sku zab pa dbyings ye shes ro mnyam pa'i
T02D1413:119a-10: ngang las / rgya che ba sangs rgyas gzugs sku'i
T02D1413:119a-11: rnam par rol pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D1413:119a-12: ngang las / cing / sku gsung thugs mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo thams cad mkhyen pa //
T02D1413:119a-13: ngo bo nyid bde ba chen po byang chub sems lhun gyis grub pa'o //
T02D1413:119a-14: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug pa bstan pa ni //
T02D1413:119a-15: mdo sde ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa chung du dang theg pa chen po rnams so //
T02D1413:119a-16: ji srid bya ba spyod sogs kri ya dang tsarya
T02D1413:119a-17: spyod pa'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor gyi bar rdo rje
T02D1413:119a-18: theg pa spyi'o // khyad par ba rnal 'byor gsang
T02D1413:119a-19: mtha' ste bla na med pa dbye ba nyid ni
T02D1413:119a-20: rgyud sde bzhi rim pas 'jug pa la sems can
T02D1413:119a-21: mos pas 'jug pa rnams blo'i rim pa'am /
T02D1413:119a-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags tshul rim pas bstan pa de dang /
T02D1413:119a-23: de la dga' ba bzhis zhes drang ba dang nges pa dang snying po'i don bstan pa'o //
T02D1413:119a-24: mtshan gyis rab grol dbang phyug bde chen go 'phang yan lag mngon 'gyur mi phyed gnas thob pa //
T02D1413:119a-25: gang zag au dum ltar te phyir ldog gang yin
T02D1413:119a-26: 'khor bar lhung la phyag rgyar grub pas lam gyur
T02D1413:119a-27: pa // skad cig dag gis rdzogs bye rnal 'byor
T02D1413:119a-28: de nyid gsang ba srid pa skye tshul dang mtshungs
T02D1413:119a-29: pa // ston // 'gro ba skal ldan skal med
T02D1413:119a-30: 'jig rten dag na chos rnams dag cing bdag med
T02D1413:119a-31: mnyam pa nyid du rang 'byung ba'o //
T02D1413:119a-32: nyan rang theg chen zhugs dang bram zer spyod dang
T02D1413:119a-33: brtul zhugs can de rnal 'byor rjes su rigs pa
T02D1413:119a-34: dang // mnyam sbyor mi 'gyur de nyid thams cad
T02D1413:119a-35: sems kyi spyod yul gsang ba mi zad chen por
T02D1413:119a-36: dang // brtag // gang du stong dang rje dbyer
T02D1413:119a-37: med chos nyid bden pa'i don ni mi rtogs byin
T02D1413:119a-38: dang // brtag // rlabs bral // tshul ngan rig
T02D1413:119a-39: byed ge'i gzhung lugs log par lta la zhen byas
T02D1413:119b-1: bla ma'i man ngag bral ba'i skye bo rtog pa'i dra bas bcings pa rnams kyis rtogs min pa /
T02D1413:119b-2: gsang chen snying po'i rgyud ni dri med 'phags pa'i nor gyi blo ldan spyod yul dag tu ni //
T02D1413:119b-3: log lta nyams byed skal bar ldan rnams yang dag lam ston mkhas rnams bsrung //
T02D1413:119b-4: mi bzed snyigs dus rtsod pa'i 'gro rnams gsang chen
T02D1413:119b-5: lam rtogs bya phyir da nyid de yi tshe na
T02D1413:119b-6: yang // dus dang dus su snying po'i don ston
T02D1413:119b-7: bla ma nyid du gyur nas bstan pa 'byung bar
T02D1413:119b-8: yang // 'gyur ba nyid // dpal ldan sngom pa
T02D1413:119b-9: chen po yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas gsang ba
T02D1413:119b-10: mdzod 'di gsang ba'i don ston pa'o //
T02D1413:119b-11: de la brjod bya dang rjod byed du bcas pa'i rgyud kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa ni /
T02D1413:119b-12: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba sku gsung thugs
T02D1413:119b-13: rdo rje rnam thar sgo gsum skad cig ma rnam
T02D1413:119b-14: par dag pa'o // rgyud kyi rgyal bo ni bla na med pa'i gsang chen no //
T02D1413:119b-15: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa 'bum pa'i nang nas byung
T02D1413:119b-16: bzhes khyad par snying po lta bu nyid de rgya
T02D1413:119b-17: mtsho chen po las nor bu rin po che dbang
T02D1413:119b-18: gi rgyal po ltar ston pa dpal rdo rje dril
T02D1413:119b-20: dngos grub kyi cho ga ni mchog dang thun mong
T02D1413:119b-21: gi grub pa myur du 'grub pa sbyin sreg dang
T02D1413:119b-23: shin tu rmad du byung ba ni byin rlabs phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1413:119b-24: bstan bcos thams cad pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D1413:119b-25: rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1413:119b-26: bstan pa'o // dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen
T02D1413:119b-27: po ni bdud las rnam par rgyal ba bklags pas
T02D1413:119b-28: bstan pa'o // 'grub pa ni / shin tu myur du don grub par byed pa'o //
T02D1413:119b-29: thams cad / mkhyen pa ni rang gzhan gnyis med rnam pa ma lus pa'i don to //
T02D1413:119b-30: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni bar du gcod pa mi 'byung pa'o //
T02D1413:119b-31: gdod ma nas grub pa ni dpal he ru ka rdo rje 'chang gi dgongs pa'o //
T02D1413:119b-32: rgyud phyi ma ni dang po chen po la ltos pa'o //
T02D1413:119b-33: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa zhes bya ba rgyud sde
T02D1413:119b-34: rnams las 'di rnal 'byor chen po bla na med
T02D1413:119b-35: pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa
T02D1413:119b-36: gcig pa rdzogs so zhes yongs su bstan pa ma
T02D1413:119b-38: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo bde
T02D1413:119b-39: mchog bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
